en: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.
ny: Iye anawonjezera kuti: "Tsopano tili ndi mbewa za miyezi 4 zomwe si za matenda a shuga koma poyamba zinali ndi matenda a shuga".

en: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.
ny: Dr. Ehud Ur, pulofesa wa zamankhwala pa Yunivesite ya Dalhousie ku Halifax, Nova Scotia ndi tcheyamani wa dipatimenti ya zamankhwala ndi sayansi ya Canadian Diabetes Association anachenjeza kuti kufufuza kuli m'masiku ake oyambirira.

en: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.
ny: Mofanana ndi akatswiri ena, iye sakhulupirira kuti matenda a shuga angathe kuchiritsidwa, ndipo ananena kuti zimene anapezazi n'zosagwirizana ndi anthu amene ali ndi matenda a shuga a mtundu woyamba.

en: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.
ny: Lolemba, Sara Danius, mlembi wokhazikika wa Komiti ya Nobel ya Literature ku Swedish Academy, analengeza poyera pa pulogalamu ya wailesi pa Sveriges Radio ku Sweden kuti komitiyo, yosakhoza kufikira Bob Dylan mwachindunji ponena za kupambana kwa 2016 Nobel Prize mu Literature, inasiya kuyesetsa kwake kuti am'fikire.

en: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."
ny: Danius anati, "Pano sitikuchita chilichonse. Ndayimbira foni ndi kutumiza maimelo kwa munthu amene amagwira naye ntchito kwambiri ndipo ndalandira mayankho abwino kwambiri.

en: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.
ny: M'mbuyomu, CEO wa Ring, Jamie Siminoff, ananena kuti kampaniyo inayamba pamene belu la pakhomo pake silinamveke m'sitolo yake m'garaja yake.

en: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.
ny: Iye anati anapanga belu la khomo la Wi-Fi.

en: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.
ny: Siminoff anati malonda ake anakwera pambuyo pa kuwonekera kwake mu 2013 mu gawo la Shark Tank kumene gulu lawonetsero linakana kupereka ndalama zoyambira.

en: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.
ny: Kumapeto kwa 2017, Siminoff anawonekera pa TV yowonetsera QVC.

en: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.
ny: Ring anakhazikitsanso mlandu ndi kampani ina yachitetezo yotchedwa ADT Corporation.

en: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.
ny: Ngakhale kuti katemera wina woyeserera akuoneka kuti angathe kuchepetsa kufa kwa anthu odwala Ebola, mpaka pano, palibe mankhwala amene asonyeza kuti ndi oyenerera kuchiza matenda amene alipo kale.

en: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.
ny: Mankhwala ena a antibody, otchedwa ZMapp, poyamba anali othandiza kwambiri, koma kafukufuku amene anachitika anasonyeza kuti mankhwalawa anali ndi phindu lochepa poletsa kufa.

en: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.
ny: Mu kuyesa kwa PALM, ZMapp inali ngati chiŵerengero, kutanthauza kuti asayansi anagwiritsa ntchito mankhwalawo monga poyambira ndi kuyerekezera mankhwala ena atatuwo.

en: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.
ny: USA Gymnastics imathandiza kalata ya United States Olympic Committee ndipo imavomereza kuti banja la Olympic lifunika kwambiri kuti anthu onse ochita maseŵera azisangalala ndi malo otetezeka.

en: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.
ny: Timagwirizana ndi mawu a USOC akuti zofuna za othamanga athu ndi magulu, ndi maseŵera awo, zingakhale bwino kupitirizabe ndi kusintha kwachindunji m'gulu lathu, m'malo mwa kuchotsedwa kwa ziphaso.

en: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.
ny: USA Gymnastics imathandiza kufufuza kosadalira kumene kungaunikire mmene kugwiritsira ntchito molakwa chiŵerengero chofotokozedwa molimba mtima ndi opulumuka a Larry Nassar kunapitira kosadziŵika kwa nthaŵi yaitali ndipo kumaphatikizapo kusintha kulikonse kofunikira ndi koyenera.

en: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.
ny: USA Gymnastics ndi USOC zili ndi cholinga chimodzi  kupanga masewera olimbitsa thupi, ndi ena, kukhala otetezeka momwe angathere kuti othamanga azitsatira maloto awo m'malo otetezeka, abwino komanso olimbikitsidwa.

en: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.
ny: M'zaka za m'ma 1960, Brzezinski anagwira ntchito kwa John F. Kennedy monga mlangizi wake ndipo kenako kwa Lyndon B. Johnson.

en: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.
ny: Pa chisankho cha 1976 adalangiza Carter pa ndale zakunja, kenako adatumikira ngati National Security Advisor (NSA) kuyambira 1977 mpaka 1981, akutsatira Henry Kissinger.

en: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.
ny: Monga NSA, anathandiza Carter mu diplomatically kusamalira nkhani dziko, monga Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US-China ubale anaganiza kumapeto 1970s; ndi Iran Revolution, zomwe zinachititsa Iran akaidi mavuto, 1979; ndi Soviet chiukira Afghanistan, 1979.

en: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.
ny: Filimuyi, yomwe inali ndi Ryan Gosling ndi Emma Stone, inalandira mayina m'magulu onse akuluakulu.

en: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.
ny: Gosling ndi Stone anapezedwa kuti ndi oyenerera kukhala wochita zisudzo zabwino kwambiri komanso wochita zisudzo zabwino kwambiri.

en: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.
ny: Mayina ena ndi Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing ndi Original Screenplay.

en: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.
ny: Nyimbo ziwiri kuchokera mu filimuyi, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) ndi City of Stars, zinapatsidwa mayina a nyimbo yabwino kwambiri. Lionsgate studio inalandira 26 mayina  zambiri kuposa studio ina iliyonse.

en: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.
ny: Lamlungu madzulo, Pulezidenti wa United States Donald Trump, m'mawu amene anapereka kudzera mwa mlembi wa nkhani, analengeza kuti asilikali a ku America achoka ku Syria.

en: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
ny: Kulengeza kumeneku kunachitika pambuyo pa kukambirana kwa pa telefoni kwa Trump ndi Pulezidenti wa Turkey Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.

en: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.
ny: Turkey idzatenganso ntchito ya kuteteza omenyera nkhondo a ISIS omwe, malinga ndi mawuwo, mayiko a ku Ulaya akana kuwabwezera kwawo.

en: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.
ny: Zimenezi sizimangotsimikizira kuti dinosaurs ena anali ndi nthenga, zimene anthu ambiri amakhulupirira, koma zimaperekanso mfundo zina zimene miyala yakale imatha kuziona, monga mtundu ndi maonekedwe a zinthu.

en: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.
ny: Asayansi amati nthenga za nyama imeneyi zinali za mtundu wa bulauni pamwamba pake ndi mbali ya pansi yake yowala kapena ya mtundu wa carotenoid.

en: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.
ny: Zimene anapezazi zimathandizanso kudziwa mmene nthenga za mbalame zinasinthira.

en: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.
ny: Chifukwa chakuti nthenga za dinosaur zilibe nthenga yotukuka bwino, yotchedwa rachis, koma zili ndi zinthu zina za nthenga  miyala ndi miyala ya m'mimba  ofufuzawo anapeza kuti rachis anali chitukuko cha m'tsogolo cha chisinthiko kuposa zinthu zina zimenezi.

en: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.
ny: Ofufuzawo ananena kuti ngakhale kuti ndi mchira wa dinosaur wamng'ono, chitsanzocho chikuonetsa kuti ndi cha munthu wamkulu osati cha mwana.

en: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.
ny: Ofufuzawo ananena kuti, ngakhale kuti uyu ndi mchira wa dinosaur wamng'ono, chitsanzocho chikuonetsa nthenga za munthu wamkulu osati za mwana.

en: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.
ny: Bomba la galimoto linaphulika ku likulu la apolisi ku Gaziantep, Turkey dzulo m'mawa, ndipo anapha apolisi aŵiri ndi kuvulaza anthu oposa makumi aŵiri.

en: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.
ny: Ofesi ya kazembe inati 19 mwa anthu ovulalawo anali apolisi.

en: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.
ny: Apolisi anena kuti akuganiza kuti munthu wina wa gulu la Daesh (ISIL) ndi amene anachititsa kuti chigawengachi chiphedwe.

en: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.
ny: Anapeza kuti dzuŵa limagwira ntchito mogwirizana ndi mfundo zofanana ndi za nyenyezi zina: Anapeza kuti zochita za nyenyezi zonse m'dongosolo lino zimayendetsedwa ndi kuwala kwawo, kuzungulira kwawo, ndi zina zotero.

en: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.
ny: Kuwala ndi kuzungulira kwake zimagwiritsidwa ntchito pamodzi kuti zitsimikizire nambala ya Rossby ya nyenyezi, yomwe imagwirizana ndi kuyenda kwa plasma.

en: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.
ny: Pamene nambala ya Rossby ili yaing'ono, nyenyezi imakhala yosagwira ntchito kwambiri pankhani ya kusintha kwa maginito.

en: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.
ny: Paulendo wake, Iwasaki anakumana ndi mavuto nthaŵi zambiri.

en: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.
ny: Anabedwa ndi achifwamba, anaukiridwa ku Tibet ndi galu wolusa, anathawa ukwati ku Nepal ndipo anamangidwa ku India.

en: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.
ny: Muyezo wa 802.11n umagwira ntchito pa ma 2.4Ghz ndi ma 5.0Ghz.

en: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.
ny: Izi zidzalola kuti ikhale yogwirizana ndi 802.11a, 802.11b ndi 802.11g, pokhapokha ngati malo oyambira ali ndi ma radio awiri.

en: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.
ny: The liwiro la 802.11n ali kwambiri mofulumira kuposa wake wakale ndi pazipita m'maganizo throughput wa 600Mbit / s.

en: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.
ny: Duvall, yemwe ali ndi ana aŵiri achikulire, sanasinthe maganizo a Miller, amene nkhaniyo inafotokozedwa kwa iye.

en: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."
ny: Atafunsidwa kuti afotokoze, Miller anati, "Mike amalankhula zambiri pa kumvetsera mlanduwu...Ndinali kukonzekera kotero sindinali kumvetsera kwenikweni zimene anali kunena".

en: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.
ny: "Tidzayesetsa kuchepetsa mpweya wa carbon dioxide pa unit ya GDP ndi malire ofunika pofika mu 2020 kuchokera pa mlingo wa 2005", anatero Hu.

en: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.
ny: Iye sanaike chiŵerengero cha kuchepetsa, ponena kuti zidzachitika potengera chuma cha China.

en: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."
ny: Hu analimbikitsa mayiko otukuka "kupeŵa njira yakale ya kuipitsa choyamba ndi kuyeretsa pambuyo pake".

en: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."
ny: Iye anawonjezera kuti "komabe, sayenera kupemphedwa kutenga maudindo amene amapitirira msinkhu wawo wa chitukuko, udindo ndi mphamvu zawo".

en: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.
ny: Gulu la ku Iraq la kafukufuku linapereka lipoti lake lero pa 12:00 GMT.

en: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.
ny: Ikuchenjeza kuti Palibe amene angatsimikizire kuti njira iliyonse yochitira zinthu ku Iraq panthaŵi ino idzaletsa nkhondo ya zipembedzo, chiwawa chowonjezereka, kapena kugwa kwachisokonezo.

en: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.
ny: Lipotili limayamba ndi pempho loti pakhale kukambirana kotseguka ndi kupanga mgwirizano mu United States pankhani ya ndale ku Middle East.

en: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.
ny: Lipotili limatsutsa kwambiri pafupifupi mbali iliyonse ya mfundo zomwe Bungwe Lolamulira likuyendera panopa ku Iraq ndipo limalimbikitsa kuti zinthu zisinthe mwamsanga.

en: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.
ny: Choyamba mwa mfundo zake 78 n'chakuti, pasanafike chaka chino, pakhale njira yatsopano ya ndale yotetezera malire a Iraq kuti asaloŵedwe m'malo ndi adani ndiponso kuti pakhazikitsidwe ubale wa ndale ndi mayiko oyandikana nawo.

en: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.
ny: M'mbuyomu, mtsogoleri wa dziko la Argentina, dzina lake Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner, analengeza kuti akufuna kukhala pulezidenti wa dzikoli.

en: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.
ny: Mayi Kirchner analengeza kuti akufuna kukhala pulezidenti ku Argentina Theatre, malo omwewo omwe anagwiritsira ntchito kuyamba kampeni yake ya 2005 ku Senate monga membala wa nthumwi ya chigawo cha Buenos Aires.

en: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."
ny: Kukambitsirana kunayambitsidwa ndi mkangano wokhudza ndalama zimene zinagwiritsidwa ntchito pothandiza ndi kumanganso zinthu pambuyo pa mphepo yamkuntho ya Katrina; imene anthu ena okonda ndalama akhala akuitcha mwachisangalalo kuti "Bush's New Orleans Deal".

en: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.
ny: Anthu amene amatsutsa ntchito yomanganso nyumbazi akhala akuganizira kwambiri za kupereka mapangano a zomangamanga kwa anthu amene amaonedwa kuti ndi odziŵa bwino ntchito ya ku Washington.

en: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.
ny: Anthu oposa mamiliyoni anayi anapita ku Roma kukachita mwambo wa malirowo.

en: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.
ny: Chiŵerengero cha anthu amene analipo chinali chachikulu kwambiri kwakuti sikunali kotheka kwa aliyense kuloŵa m'manda a pa St. Peter's Square.

en: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.
ny: Anthu anaika pa TV zoonera zinthu zikuluzikulu m'malo osiyanasiyana a ku Roma kuti anthu azionera mwambowu.

en: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.
ny: M'mizinda ina yambiri ya ku Italy ndi m'mayiko ena, makamaka ku Poland, anaonetsa zithunzi zofanana ndi zimenezi, ndipo anthu ambiri anaziona.

en: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.
ny: Olemba mbiri akhala akudzudzula mfundo za FBI za m'mbuyomu chifukwa cha kuika zinthu zawo pa milandu imene ndi yosavuta kuthetsa, makamaka milandu ya galimoto zobedwa, ndi cholinga chofuna kulimbikitsa kupambana kwa bungwe.

en: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.
ny: Congress inayamba kupereka ndalama zothandizira ntchito yoletsa zolaula m'chaka cha 2005 ndipo inalongosola kuti FBI iyenera kupereka antchito 10 ku zolaula za anthu akuluakulu.

en: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.
ny: Robin Uthappa anapanga mphambu yaikulu kwambiri, 70 inachita mu mipira 41 chabe ndi kugunda ma fours 11 ndi ma six 2.

en: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.
ny: Oimba a m'gulu lapakati, Sachin Tendulkar ndi Rahul Dravid, anachita bwino kwambiri ndipo anapanga mgwirizano wa ma 100 a ma.

en: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.
ny: Koma, atataya wicket ya kapitawo, India inangochita ma 36 okha atataya ma 7 kuti athetse ma innings.

en: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.
ny: Pulezidenti wa United States George W. Bush anafika ku Singapore m'mawa wa pa November 16, kuyamba ulendo wa mlungu umodzi wa ku Asia.

en: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.
ny: Iye analandiridwa ndi Wachiwiri kwa Nduna Yaikulu ya Singapore Wong Kan Seng ndipo anakambirana ndi Nduna Yaikulu ya Singapore Lee Hsien Loong nkhani za malonda ndi uchigawenga.

en: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.
ny: Patatha mlungu umodzi ataphwanyidwa pa chisankho cha pakati pa nyengo, Bush anauza omvetsera za kukula kwa malonda ku Asia.

en: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.
ny: Nduna yaikulu Stephen Harper wavomera kutumiza 'Clean Air Act' ya boma ku komiti ya zipani zonse kuti akaonerenso, isanawerengedwe kachiwiri, pambuyo pa msonkhano wa mphindi 25 wa Lachiwiri ndi mtsogoleri wa NDP Jack Layton ku PMO.

en: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.
ny: Layton anapempha kuti asinthe lamulo la zachilengedwe la Conservatives pamsonkhano ndi PM, kupempha "kulembedwanso mwatsatanetsatane ndi kwathunthu" kwa lamulo la zachilengedwe la Conservative Party.

en: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.
ny: Chiyambire pamene boma la Federal linaloŵerera kuti litenge ndalama za chipatala cha Mersey ku Devonport, Tasmania, boma la boma ndi aphungu ena a boma akhala akutsutsa lamulo limeneli monga chithunzithunzi cha chisankho cha boma chomwe chiyenera kuchitika mu November.

en: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.
ny: Koma Nduna Yaikulu John Howard wanena kuti lamuloli linali kokha lotetezera zipatala kuti zisatsitsidwe ndi boma la Tasmania, mwa kupereka ndalama zowonjezera za AUD$45 miliyoni.

en: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.
ny: Malinga ndi nkhani yaposachedwapa, kuwerengetsa kwa madzi a m'nyanja kunasonyeza kuti kunayambika tsunami.

en: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.
ny: Palibe amene anavulala kwambiri ku Tonga, koma magetsi anasowa kwakanthawi, ndipo izi zinalepheretsa akuluakulu a ku Tonga kulandira chenjezo la tsunami lochokera ku PTWC.

en: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.
ny: Sukulu 14 ku Hawaii zomwe zili pafupi ndi gombe kapena pafupi nazo zinatsekedwa Lachitatu lonse ngakhale kuti machenjezo anachotsedwa.

en: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.
ny: Pulezidenti wa United States George W. Bush analandira mwaulemu chilengezocho.

en: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."
ny: Mneneri wa Bush Gordon Johndroe anatcha lonjezo la North Korea kukhala "mapazi aakulu kulinga ku cholinga cha kukwaniritsa kusakhala ndi zida za nyukiliya kwa chilumba cha Korea".

en: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.
ny: Mphepo yamkuntho ya nambala 10 ya nyengo ya mphepo yamkuntho ya Atlantic, Subtropical Storm Jerry, inachitika m'nyanja ya Atlantic lero.

en: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.
ny: Bungwe loona za mphepo yamkuntho lotchedwa National Hurricane Center (NHC) linanena kuti pakali pano, mphepo ya Jerry siikuopseza dziko.

en: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.
ny: Bungwe la U.S. Corps of Engineers linalingalira kuti mvula ya masentimita 6 ingaphwanye madamu owonongeka kale.

en: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.
ny: Dera lachisanu ndi chinayi, limene linadzaza ndi madzi okwana mamita 6 pa nthawi ya mphepo yamkuntho ya Katrina, lili m'madzi okwana chiuno chifukwa chakuti ngalande ya m'mbali mwa mzindawo inadzaza.

en: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.
ny: Madzi akuphwera pa damu m'chigawo cha mamita 30.

en: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.
ny: Woyang'anira Commons Adam Cuerden anafotokoza kukhumudwa kwake chifukwa cha kufufutidwa kwa zinthu pamene analankhula ndi Wikinews mwezi watha.

en: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."
ny: "Iye [Wales] kwenikweni anatiuza bodza kuyambira pachiyambi. Choyamba, mwa kuchita ngati kuti izi zinali zalamulo. Chachiŵiri, mwa kunamizira kuti anali kutimvetsera, mpaka kuletsa kwake kwa zojambulazo".

en: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.
ny: Kukwiyitsa kwa anthu kunapangitsa kuti pakhale zoyesayesa zofuna kukhazikitsa mfundo zokhudza kugonana pa webusaitiyi yomwe ili ndi mamiliyoni a mauthenga omwe ali ndi chilolezo chowonekera.

en: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.
ny: Ntchito imene inachitika inali ya maganizo, koma pulogalamuyo inalembedwa kuti iyerekezere zimene anthu ankaona m'mlengalenga wa Sagittarius.

en: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.
ny: Zotsatira zimene gululi linali kufunafuna zikanakhala chifukwa cha mphamvu za mafunde pakati pa zinthu zakuda za m'mlengalenga ndi zinthu zakuda za m'mlengalenga wa Milky Way.

en: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.
ny: Mofanana ndi mmene mwezi umakokera dziko lapansi, n'kuchititsa kuti madzi azigwera m'mphepete mwa nyanja, mlalang'amba wa Milky Way umakokeranso m'mphepete mwa mlalang'amba wa Sagittarius.

en: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.
ny: Asayansiwo anatha kunena kuti zinthu zamdima zimakhudza zinthu zina zamdima mofanana ndi mmene zinthu zina zimachitira.

en: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.
ny: Lingaliro limeneli limanena kuti zinthu zambiri zakuda zimene zili m'mlengalenga zimapezeka m'mlengalenga mwa mtundu wina wa halo, ndipo zimapangidwa ndi tinthu tating'onoting'ono.

en: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.
ny: Malipoti a pawailesi yakanema amasonyeza utsi woyera ukuchokera ku fakitaleyo.

en: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.
ny: Akuluakulu a boma akuchenjeza anthu okhala pafupi ndi malo opangira mafuta kuti asaloŵe m'nyumba, asatseke mpweya wofewetsa ndiponso asamwe madzi a m'mbale.

en: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.
ny: Malinga ndi kunena kwa bungwe la nyukiliya la Japan, cesium ndi ayodini za radioactive zazindikiridwa pa siteshoniyo.

en: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.
ny: Akuluakulu akuganiza kuti zimenezi zikusonyeza kuti mabotolo omwe anali ndi mafuta a uranium pa malowo mwina anaphulika ndipo akutayikira.

en: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.
ny: Dr. Tony Moll anapeza matenda a TB amene amalimbana kwambiri ndi mankhwala (XDR-TB) m'dera la South Africa la KwaZulu-Natal.

en: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."
ny: Poyankhulana ndi anthu, iye anati mtundu watsopanowu "ndi wovuta kwambiri ndiponso wochititsa mantha chifukwa cha kuchuluka kwa anthu amene amafa".

en: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
ny: Dr. Moll akuganiza kuti odwala ena angakhale atalandira kachilomboka m'chipatala, ndipo osachepera aŵiri anali ogwira ntchito zaumoyo m'chipatalacho.

en: In one year's time, an infected person may infect 10 to 15 close contacts.
ny: M'chaka chimodzi, munthu amene ali ndi kachilomboka amatha kupatsira matenda anthu 10 kapena 15 amene anali naye pafupi.

en: However, the percentage of XDR-TB in the entire group of people with tuberculosis still seems to be low; 6,000 of the total 330,000 people infected at any particular moment in South Africa.
ny: Komabe, chiŵerengero cha anthu odwala TB ya XDR m'gulu lonse la anthu odwala TB chikuonekabe kukhala chochepa; anthu 6,000 mwa anthu 330,000 onse odwala TB panthawi ina iliyonse ku South Africa.

en: The satellites, both of which weighed in excess of 1,000 pounds, and traveling at approximately 17,500 miles per hour, collided 491 miles above the Earth.
ny: M'mlengalenga, onse aŵiriwo anali olemera makilogalamu oposa 1,000, ndipo anali kuyenda pa liŵiro la pafupifupi makilomita 17,500 pa ola limodzi, anakumana pa mtunda wa makilomita 491 kuchokera pa dziko lapansi.

en: Scientists say the explosion caused by the collision was massive.
ny: Asayansi amanena kuti kuphulika kumene kunayambitsidwa ndi kugundana kwa galimotoyo kunali kwakukulu kwambiri.

en: They are still trying to determine just how large the crash was and how the Earth will be affected.
ny: Iwo akuyesetsabe kudziŵa kuti ngoziyo inali yaikulu motani ndiponso kuti idzakhudza bwanji dziko lapansi.

en: The United States Strategic Command of the U.S. Department of Defense office is tracking the debris.
ny: Bungwe la United States Strategic Command la ofesi ya Dipatimenti ya Chitetezo la United States likufufuza zotsalazo.

en: The result of plotting analysis will be posted to a public website.
ny: Zotsatira za kusanthula kwa mapulaniwo zidzaikidwa pa webusaiti ya anthu onse.

en: A doctor who worked at Children's Hospital of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania will be charged with aggravated murder after her mother was found dead in the trunk of her car Wednesday, authorities in Ohio say.
ny: Dokotala amene anagwira ntchito ku Children's Hospital ya ku Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, adzapatsidwa mlandu wa kupha munthu chifukwa cha zinthu zoopsa kwambiri pambuyo poti mayi ake anapezeka atafa m'thumba la galimoto yawo Lachitatu, atero akuluakulu a boma ku Ohio.

en: Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, was found in Blue Ash, Ohio, a suburb approximately 15 miles north of Cincinnati lying on the ground beside the road in a T-shirt and underwear in an apparently heavily medicated state.
ny: Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, wazaka 29, anapezeka ku Blue Ash, Ohio, tawuni ina ya kum'mwera kwa Cincinnati, atagona pansi m'mbali mwa msewu atavala T-shirt ndi zovala zamkati ndipo zikuoneka kuti anali atagwiritsa ntchito mankhwala.

en: She directed officers to her black Oldsmobile Intrigue which was 500 feet away.
ny: Anatsogolera apolisi ku Oldsmobile yake yakuda ya Intrigue yomwe inali pamtunda wa mamita 500.

en: There, they found the body of Saroja Balasubramanian, 53, covered with blood-stained blankets.
ny: Kumeneko, anapeza mtembo wa Saroja Balasubramanian, wa zaka 53, ataphimbidwa ndi madengu okhala ndi magazi.

en: Police said that the body appeared to have been there for about a day.
ny: Apolisi ananena kuti zikuoneka kuti mtembowo unali pamenepo kwa tsiku limodzi.

en: The first cases of the disease this season were reported in late July.
ny: Anthu oyamba kudwala matendawa m'nyengo ino analembedwa kumapeto kwa July.

en: The disease is carried by pigs, which then migrates to humans through mosquitos.
ny: Matendawa amafalitsidwa ndi nkhumba, ndipo kenako amafalitsidwa kwa anthu kudzera mwa udzudzu.

en: The outbreak has prompted the Indian government to undertake such measures as deployment of pig catchers in seriously affected areas, distributing thousands of mosquito curtains and spraying pesticides.
ny: Mliriwu wachititsa boma la India kuyamba kuchitapo kanthu monga kutumiza anthu osodza nkhumba m'madera amene akhudzidwa kwambiri ndi mliriwu, kugawa zikwizikwi za nsalu zotchinga udzudzu ndi kupopera mankhwala ophera tizilombo.

en: Several million vials of encephalitis vaccine have also been promised by the government, which will help prepare health agencies for next year.
ny: Boma laonjezeranso kuti lidzapereka katemera wa matenda a ubongo okwana mamiliyoni angapo, ndipo zimenezi zidzathandiza kukonzekeretsa mabungwe azaumoyo chaka chamawa.

en: Plans for vaccines to be delivered to the historically most affected areas this year were delayed due to lack of funds and low prioritisation relative to other diseases.
ny: Mapulani oti katemera aperekedwe kumadera amene akhudzidwa kwambiri chaka chino anachedwa chifukwa cha kusowa kwa ndalama ndiponso chifukwa cha kuchepa kwa zinthu zofunika kwambiri poyerekezera ndi matenda ena.

en: In 1956 Słania moved to Sweden, where three years later he began work for the Swedish Post Office and became their chief engraver.
ny: Mu 1956 Słania anasamukira ku Sweden, kumene zaka zitatu pambuyo pake anayamba kugwira ntchito ku ofesi ya positi ya ku Sweden ndipo anakhala wolemba mabuku wamkulu.

en: He produced over 1,000 stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries.
ny: Anatulutsa masitampu oposa 1,000 opita ku Sweden ndi kumayiko ena 28.

en: His work is of such recognized quality and detail that he is one of the very few "household names" among philatelists. Some specialize in collecting his work alone.
ny: Ntchito yake ndi yodziŵika bwino kwambiri moti ndi mmodzi wa anthu ochepa kwambiri amene amalembetsa mabuku a filatelist.

en: His 1,000th stamp was the magnificent "Great Deeds by Swedish Kings" by David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl in 2000, which is listed in the Guinness Book of World Records.
ny: Sitimayi yake ya nambala 1,000 inali "Ntchito Zazikulu za Mafumu a ku Sweden" zolembedwa ndi David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl mu 2000, zomwe zinalembedwa m'Buku la Guinness la Mbiri Zopambana Padziko Lonse.

en: He was also engaged in engraving banknotes for many countries, recent examples of his work including the Prime Ministerial portraits on the front of the new Canadian $5 and $100 bills.
ny: Analinso ndi ntchito yojambula ndalama za mayiko ambiri, zitsanzo zaposachedwapa za ntchito yake kuphatikizapo zithunzi za Prime Minister pa kutsogolo kwa ndalama zatsopano za ku Canada za $ 5 ndi $ 100.

en: After the accident occurred, Gibson was transported to a hospital but died shortly afterwards.
ny: Ngoziyo itachitika, Gibson anatengedwa kupita kuchipatala koma anamwalira patangopita nthawi yochepa.

en: The truck driver, who is aged 64, was not injured in the crash.
ny: Woyendetsa galimotoyo, yemwe ali ndi zaka 64, sanavulale pangoziyo.

en: The vehicle itself was taken away from the scene of the accident at approximately 1200 GMT on the same day.
ny: Galimotoyo inachotsedwa pa malo a ngoziyo pafupifupi pa 1200 GMT patsiku lomwelo.

en: A person working in a garage near where the accident occurred said: "There were children waiting to cross the road and they were all screaming and crying."
ny: Munthu wina amene amagwira ntchito m'malo osungira magalimoto pafupi ndi malo amene ngoziyo inachitika anati: "Panali ana amene anali kuyembekezera kuwoloka msewu ndipo onse anali kufuula ndi kulira".

en: They all ran back from where the accident had happened.
ny: Onse anathaŵa kuchoka pamalo amene ngoziyo inachitika.

en: Other subjects on the agenda in Bali include saving the world's remaining forests, and sharing technologies to help developing nations grow in less-polluting ways.
ny: Nkhani zina zimene zili pa ndandanda ku Bali zikuphatikizapo kupulumutsa nkhalango zomwe zatsala padziko lonse, ndi kugawana matekinoloje othandiza mayiko omwe akutukuka kukula m'njira zosasokoneza kwambiri.

en: The U.N. also hopes to finalize a fund to help countries affected by global warming to cope with the impacts.
ny: UN ikuyembekezeranso kukhazikitsa thumba lothandiza mayiko amene akukhudzidwa ndi kutentha kwa dziko kuti athane ndi mavuto ake.

en: The money could go toward flood-proof houses, better water management, and crop diversification.
ny: Ndalamazo zingagwiritsiridwe ntchito popanga nyumba zosagwera madzi, kusamalira bwino madzi, ndi kusinthitsa mbewu.

en: Fluke wrote that the efforts by some to drown out women from speaking out about women’s health were unsuccessful.
ny: Fluke analemba kuti zoyesayesa za ena zofuna kuti akazi asalankhule za thanzi la akazi sizinapambane.

en: She came to this conclusion due to the multitude of positive comments and encouragement sent to her by both female and male individuals urging that contraception medication be considered a medical necessity.
ny: Anapeza yankho limeneli chifukwa cha ndemanga zambiri zabwino ndi chilimbikitso zimene anam'patsa kuchokera kwa anthu aamuna ndi aakazi omwe anali kumulimbikitsa kuti mankhwala oletsa kutenga mimba azionedwa kukhala ofunika kwambiri pa zachipatala.

en: When the fighting ceased after the wounded were transported to the hospital, about 40 of the other remaining inmates stayed in the yard and refused to return to their cells.
ny: Nkhondoyo itatha, anthu ovulalawo anatengedwa kupita nawo kuchipatala, koma akaidi ena pafupifupi 40 amene anatsala anakhalabe m'bwalo la ndende ndipo anakana kubwerera m'ndende zawo.

en: Negotiators tried to rectify the situation, but the prisoners' demands are not clear.
ny: Oyankhulana anayesa kukonza zinthu, koma zimene akaidiwo ankafuna sizinali zomveka.

en: Between 10:00-11:00 pm MDT, a fire was started by the inmates in the yard.
ny: Pakati pa 10:00 ndi 11:00 madzulo MDT, moto unayambitsidwa ndi akaidi m'bwalo.

en: Soon, officers equipped with riot gear entered the yard and cornered the inmates with tear gas.
ny: Posakhalitsa, apolisi okhala ndi zida zophera chipwirikiti analowa m'bwalo ndi kuika ma gas ophulitsa misozi pa akaidiwo.

en: Fire rescue crews eventually doused the fire by 11:35 pm.
ny: Anthu opulumutsa anthu pamapeto pake anazimitsa motowo cha m'ma 11:35 madzulo.

en: After the dam was built in 1963, the seasonal floods that would spread sediment throughout the river were halted.
ny: Damuli litapangidwa mu 1963, madzi osefukira amene anali kudzala m'mphepete mwa mtsinjewo analetsedwa.

en: This sediment was necessary for creating sandbars and beaches, which served as wildlife habitats.
ny: Mchenga umenewu unali wofunika kwambiri kuti pakhale mchenga ndi magombe, omwe anali malo okhala nyama zakutchire.

en: As a result, two fish species have become extinct, and two others have become endangered, including the humpback chub.
ny: Chifukwa cha zimenezi, mitundu iŵiri ya nsomba yatha, ndipo mitundu ina iŵiri ya nsomba, kuphatikizapo mtundu wa humpback chub, yatsala pang'ono kutha.

en: Although the water level will only rise a few feet after the flood, officials are hoping it will be enough to restore eroded sandbars downstream.
ny: Ngakhale kuti madzi adzangowonjezereka mamita angapo pambuyo pa chigumulacho, akuluakulu a boma akuyembekeza kuti kudzakhala kokwanira kubwezeretsa mchenga wowonongeka m'mphepete mwa mtsinjewo.

en: No tsunami warning has been issued, and according to the Jakarta geophysics agency, no tsunami warning will be issued because the quake did not meet the magnitude 6.5 requirement.
ny: Palibe chenjezo la tsunami limene laperekedwa, ndipo malinga ndi bungwe la Jakarta geophysics, palibe chenjezo la tsunami limene lidzaperekedwa chifukwa chakuti chivomezicho sichinakwaniritse zofunikira za kukula kwa 6.5.

en: Despite there being no tsunami threat, residents started to panic and began to leave their businesses and homes.
ny: Ngakhale kuti kunalibe chiopsezo cha tsunami, anthu a m'deralo anayamba kuchita mantha ndipo anayamba kusiya mabizinesi awo ndi nyumba zawo.

en: Although Winfrey was tearful in her farewell, she made it clear to her fans she will be back.
ny: Ngakhale kuti Winfrey anali ndi misozi m'mawu ake aulemu, iye anafotokoza momveka bwino kwa mafani ake kuti adzabweranso.

en: "This is not going to be goodbye. This is the closing of one chapter and the opening of a new one."
ny: "Izi sizidzakhala zakuti tisiyane.

en: Final results from Namibian presidential and parliamentary elections have indicated that the incumbent president, Hifikepunye Pohamba, has been reelected by a large margin.
ny: Zotsatira zomaliza za chisankho cha pulezidenti ndi cha m'parliament ku Namibia zasonyeza kuti pulezidenti wa pakali pano, Hifikepunye Pohamba, wasankhidwa ndi chiŵerengero chachikulu.

en: The ruling party, South West Africa People's Organisation (SWAPO), also retained a majority in the parliamentary elections.
ny: Chipani cholamulira, South West Africa People's Organisation (SWAPO), chinasungiranso ambiri pa zisankho za m'parliament.

en: Coalition and Afghan troops moved into the area to secure the site and other coalition aircraft have been sent to assist.
ny: Asilikali a gulu la nkhondo la mgwirizano ndi a Afghanistan analowa m'derali kuti ateteze malowo ndipo ndege zina za gulu la nkhondo la mgwirizano zinatumizidwa kuti zithandize.

en: The crash occurred high up in mountainous terrain, and is believed to have been the result of hostile fire.
ny: Ngoziyo inachitika m'mapiri, ndipo akukhulupirira kuti inachitika chifukwa cha kuwomberedwa ndi adani.

en: Efforts to search for the crash site are being met by bad weather and harsh terrain.
ny: Ntchito yofufuza malo amene ngoziyi inachitika ikulephera chifukwa cha nyengo yoipa komanso malo ovuta.

en: The medical charity Mangola, Medecines Sans Frontieres and the World Health Organisation say it is the worst outbreak recorded in the country.
ny: Bungwe la zachipatala lothandiza anthu la Mangola, Medecines Sans Frontieres ndi World Health Organization akuti ndi mliri woipitsitsa kwambiri womwe walembedwa m'dzikoli.

en: Spokesman for Medecines Sans Frontiere Richard Veerman said: "Angola is heading for its worst ever outbreak and the situation remains very bad in Angola," he said.
ny: Mneneri wa bungwe la Medecines Sans Frontiere, Richard Veerman, anati: "Angola akupita ku mliri woipitsitsa kwambiri ndipo zinthu zikadali zoipa kwambiri ku Angola", iye anatero.

en: The games kicked off at 10:00am with great weather and apart from mid morning drizzle which quickly cleared up, it was a perfect day for 7's rugby.
ny: Maseŵera anayamba pa 10:00 m'mawa ndi nyengo yabwino ndipo kupatulapo mvula yam'maŵa imene inatha mwamsanga, linali tsiku langwiro la mpira wa 7's.

en: Tournament top seeds South Africa started on the right note when they had a comfortable 26 - 00 win against 5th seeded Zambia.
ny: Mpikisanowu unayamba bwino kwambiri pamene South Africa inagonjetsa dziko la Zambia lomwe linali pa nambala 5 ndi 26 - 00.

en: Looking decidedly rusty in the game against their southern sisters, South Africa however steadily improved as the tournament progressed.
ny: Poyang'ana mosakayikira mu masewera motsutsana ndi alongo awo akumwera, South Africa komabe idasintha mosasintha pamene mpikisanowo unapita patsogolo.

en: Their disciplined defence, ball handling skills and excellent team work made them stand out and it was clear that this was the team to beat.
ny: Chitetezo chawo chodzidzimutsa, luso lawo la kusamalira mpira ndi ntchito yabwino ya gulu zinawachititsa kukhala osiyana ndi ena ndipo zinali zoonekeratu kuti gulu limeneli ndi limene linayenera kugonjetsedwa.

en: Officials for the city of Amsterdam and the Anne Frank Museum state that the tree is infected with a fungus and poses a public health hazard as they argue that it was in imminent danger of falling over.
ny: Akuluakulu a mzinda wa Amsterdam ndi nyumba yosungiramo zinthu zakale ya Anne Frank akunena kuti mtengowo uli ndi matenda a bowa ndipo uli ndi chiopsezo cha thanzi la anthu chifukwa chakuti iwo akunena kuti unali pangozi yaikulu ya kugwa.

en: It had been scheduled to be cut down on Tuesday, but was saved after an emergency court ruling.
ny: Inali yokonzedweratu kuti idzawonongedwe Lachiwiri, koma inapulumutsidwa pambuyo pa chigamulo cha khoti la mwadzidzidzi.

en: Infrared images show that the temperature variations from night and day show that they are likely caves.
ny: Zithunzi za infrared zimasonyeza kuti kutentha kwa usiku ndi masana kumasonyeza kuti mwina ndi mapanga.

en: "They are cooler than the surrounding surface in the day and warmer at night.
ny: "Masana zimakhala zozizira kuposa malo ozungulira ndipo usiku zimakhala zotentha.

en: Their thermal behavior is not as steady as large caves on Earth that often maintain a fairly constant temperature, but it is consistent with these being deep holes in the ground," said Glen Cushing of the United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team and of Northern Arizona University located in Flagstaff, Arizona.
ny: Maganizo awo a kutentha sakhala ofanana ndi a mapanga akuluakulu a padziko lapansi amene nthaŵi zambiri amakhala ndi kutentha kosasintha, koma n'zogwirizana ndi kuti amenewa ndi mabowo akuya m'nthaka", anatero Glen Cushing wa gulu la Astrogeology la United States Geological Survey (USGS) ndi la Northern Arizona University lomwe lili ku Flagstaff, Arizona.

en: In France, voting has traditionally been a low-tech experience: voters isolate themselves in a booth, put a pre-printed sheet of paper indicating their candidate of choice into an envelope.
ny: Ku France, kaŵirikaŵiri anthu amavota m'malo osakhala ndi zipangizo zamakono: anthu amavota amadzipatula okha m'chipinda cha voti, amaika pepala losindikizidwa kale limene limafotokoza za munthu amene akufuna kuloŵa m'malowo m'mavwende.

en: After officials verify the voter's identity, the voter drops the envelope into the ballot box and signs the voting roll.
ny: Akuluakulu a boma akaona kuti munthuyo ndi ndani, amaika envelopuyo m'bokosi la voti n'kusayina chikalatacho.

en: French electoral law rather strictly codifies the proceedings.
ny: Malamulo a chisankho a ku France amalemba malamulo okhwima a ndondomeko ya chisankho.

en: Since 1988, ballot boxes must be transparent so that voters and observers can witness that no envelopes are present at the start of the vote and that no envelopes are added except those of the duly counted and authorized voters.
ny: Kuyambira mu 1988, mabokosi a voti ayenera kukhala oonekera kuti ovota ndi oonerera aone kuti palibe envelopu yomwe ilipo poyambira kuvota ndi kuti palibe envelopu yomwe imawonjezeredwa kupatula ya ovota omwe amawerengedwa bwino ndi ovomerezeka.

en: Candidates can send representatives to witness every part of the process. In the evening, votes are counted by volunteers under heavy supervision, following specific procedures.
ny: Anthu ofuna kuloŵa m'malo amalola kuti anthu awo azionera zochitika zonse za m'tsogolomu.

en: ASUS Eee PC, earlier launched world-wide for cost-saving and functionality factors, became a hot topic in 2007 Taipei IT Month.
ny: ASUS Eee PC, yomwe idayambitsidwa padziko lonse lapansi chifukwa chowononga ndalama komanso magwiridwe antchito, idakhala nkhani yotentha mu 2007 Taipei IT Month.

en: But the consumer market on laptop computer will be radically varied and changed after ASUS was awarded in the 2007 Taiwan Sustainable Award by Executive Yuan of the Republic of China.
ny: Koma msika wa ogula pa kompyuta laputopu adzakhala kwambiri zosiyanasiyana ndi kusintha pambuyo ASUS anapatsidwa mu 2007 Taiwan Sustainable Award ndi Executive Yuan wa Republic of China.

en: The station's web site describes the show as "old school radio theater with a new and outrageous geeky spin!"
ny: Webusaiti ya siteshoniyo ikufotokoza kuti chionetserocho ndi "chionetsero cha pawailesi cha sukulu yakale chokhala ndi maonekedwe atsopano ndi odabwitsa a ma geek!"

en: In its early days, the show was featured solely at the long-running internet radio site TogiNet Radio, a site focused on talk radio.
ny: M'masiku ake oyambirira, chiwonetserocho chinaperekedwa kokha pa webusaiti ya wailesi ya intaneti ya TogiNet Radio, malo omwe amayang'ana pa wailesi.

en: In late 2015, TogiNet established AstroNet Radio as a subsidiary station.
ny: Kumapeto kwa 2015, TogiNet idakhazikitsa AstroNet Radio ngati station yothandizirana nayo.

en: The show originally featured amateur voice actors, local to East Texas.
ny: Poyamba, pa seweroli panali anthu ena oimba nyimbo za anthu ena, omwe ankakhala ku East Texas.

en: Widespread looting reportedly continued overnight, as law enforcement officers were not present on Bishkek's streets.
ny: Akuti anthu anapitirizabe kuba usiku wonse chifukwa chakuti apolisi sanalipo m'misewu ya ku Bishkek.

en: Bishkek was described as sinking into a state of "anarchy" by one observer, as gangs of people roamed the streets and plundered stores of consumer goods.
ny: Munthu wina ananena kuti mzinda wa Bishkek uli pa "mkhalidwe wa kusamvera malamulo", pamene magulu a anthu akuyendayenda m'misewu ndi kulanda zinthu m'masitolo.

en: Several Bishkek residents blamed protesters from the south for the lawlessness.
ny: Anthu ambiri a ku Bishkek anadzudzula anthu a kum'mwera chifukwa cha kusamvera malamulo.

en: South Africa have defeated the All Blacks (New Zealand) in a rugby union Tri Nations match at the Royal Bafokeng Stadium in Rustenburg, South Africa.
ny: South Africa yagonjetsa All Blacks (New Zealand) mu masewera a rugby union Tri Nations ku Royal Bafokeng Stadium ku Rustenburg, South Africa.

en: The final score was a one-point victory, 21 to 20, ending the All Blacks' 15 game winning streak.
ny: Mapeto ake, onse a All Blacks anapambana ndi mfundo imodzi, 21 mpaka 20, ndipo izi zinathetsa kupambana kwa All Blacks pa masewera 15.

en: For the Springboks, it ended a five-match losing streak.
ny: Kwa a Springboks, zinathera pa kugonjetsa kwa maseŵera asanu.

en: It was the final match for the All Blacks, who had already won the trophy two weeks ago.
ny: Unali mpikisano womaliza wa All Blacks, amene anapambana kale chikhocho milungu iŵiri yapitayo.

en: The final match of the series will take place at Ellis Park in Johannesburg next week, when the Springboks play Australia.
ny: Maseŵera omaliza a mndandandawo adzachitika ku Ellis Park ku Johannesburg mlungu wamawa, pamene Springboks idzaseŵera ndi Australia.

en: A moderate earthquake shook western Montana at 10:08 p.m. on Monday.
ny: Chivomezi chochepa chinagwedeza kumadzulo kwa Montana Lolemba pa 10:08 p.m.

en: No immediate reports of damage have been received by the United States Geological Survey (USGS) and its National Earthquake Information Center.
ny: Palibe malipoti a kuwonongeka kwa zinthu zomwe zachitika ku United States Geological Survey (USGS) ndi National Earthquake Information Center.

en: The earthquake was centered about 20 km (15 miles) north-northeast of Dillon, and about 65 km (40 miles) south of Butte.
ny: Chivomezichi chinachitika pa mtunda wa makilomita pafupifupi 20 kumpoto chakum'mawa kwa Dillon, ndipo pa mtunda wa makilomita pafupifupi 65 kum'mwera kwa Butte.

en: The strain of bird flu lethal to humans, H5N1, has been confirmed to have infected a dead wild duck, found on Monday, in marshland near Lyon in the east of France.
ny: Mtundu wa chimfine cha mbalame, H5N1, umene umafalitsa anthu, watsimikiziridwa kuti wachititsa nthenda ya mbidzi yakuthengo yakufa, yomwe inapezeka Lolemba, m'madambo pafupi ndi Lyon kum'mawa kwa France.

en: France is the seventh country in the European Union to suffer this virus; following Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece and Italy.
ny: Dziko la France ndilo lachisanu ndi chiŵiri m'Uyunizimu limene lili ndi kachilomboka; pambuyo pa Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece ndi Italy.

en: Suspected cases of H5N1 in Croatia and Denmark remain unconfirmed.
ny: Pali milandu ya H5N1 imene akuganiza kuti inachitika ku Croatia ndi ku Denmark imene sinatsimikizidwe.

en: Chambers had sued God for "widespread death, destruction and terrorization of millions upon millions of the Earth's inhabitants."
ny: Chambers anali atamuimba mlandu Mulungu chifukwa cha "kufa, kuwonongedwa, ndi kuwopseza mamiliyoni ambirimbiri a anthu okhala padziko lapansi".

en: Chambers, an agnostic, argues that his lawsuit is "frivolous" and "anybody can sue anybody."
ny: Chambers, yemwe ndi wosakhulupirira kuti kuli Mulungu, akunena kuti mlandu wake ndi "wosaphula kanthu" ndipo "aliyense akhoza kuzenga mlandu aliyense".

en: The story presented in the French opera, by Camille Saint-Saens, is of an artist "whose life is dictated by a love for drugs and Japan."
ny: Nkhani imene inalembedwa m'nyimbo ya opera ya ku France, yolembedwa ndi Camille Saint-Saens, ndi ya wojambula "amene moyo wake umalamulidwa ndi kukonda mankhwala osokoneza bongo ndi Japan".

en: As a result, the performers smoke cannabis joints on stage, and the theatre itself is encouraging the audience to join in.
ny: Zotsatira zake n'zakuti, oimbawo amasuta chamba pamwambowo, ndipo bwalo la maseŵero lokha limalimbikitsa omvetsera kuti nawonso achite nawo.

en: Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas governor Rick Perry, and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann finished in fourth, fifth, and sixth place, respectively.
ny: Pulezidenti wakale wa Nyumba ya Malamulo Newt Gingrich, kazembe wa Texas Rick Perry, ndi membala wa Nyumba ya Malamulo Michele Bachmann anamaliza pa malo achinayi, achisanu, ndi achisanu ndi chimodzi, motsatana.

en: After the results came in, Gingrich lauded Santorum, but had tough words for Romney, on whose behalf negative campaign advertisements were aired in Iowa against Gingrich.
ny: Zotsatirazo zitangofika, Gingrich anayamikira Santorum, koma anali ndi mawu okhwima kwa Romney, amene malonda a kampeni yoipa anaulutsidwa ku Iowa motsutsana ndi Gingrich.

en: Perry stated that he would "return to Texas to assess the results of tonight's caucus, determine whether there is a path forward for myself in this race", but later said that he would remain in the race and compete in the January 21 South Carolina primary.
ny: Perry ananena kuti "adzabwerera ku Texas kuti akaone zotsatira za msonkhano wa usikuuno, kuti adziwe ngati pali njira yopita patsogolo pa mpikisanowu", koma kenako adati adzapitirizabe mpikisanowu ndipo adzapikisana nawo pa January 21 ku South Carolina.

en: Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign.
ny: Bachmann, amene anapambana pa kafukufuku wa Ames Straw Poll mu August, anaganiza zothetsa kampeni yake.

en: The photographer was transported to Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, where he subsequently died.
ny: Wojambula zithunziyo anatumizidwa ku Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, kumene anamwalira.

en: He was reportedly aged in his 20s. In a statement, Bieber said "[w]hile I was not present nor directly involved with this tragic accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim."
ny: M'mawu ake, Bieber anati "[ngakhale] sindinalipo kapena kuchita nawo mwatsatanetsatane ngozi yoopsayi, malingaliro anga ndi mapemphero ali ndi banja la womwalirayo".

en: Entertainment news website TMZ understands the photographer stopped his vehicle on the other side of Sepulveda Boulevard and attempted to take pictures of the police stop before crossing the road and continuing, prompting the California Highway Patrol police officer conducting the traffic stop to order him back across, twice.
ny: Webusaiti ya nkhani za zosangalatsa TMZ imamvetsetsa kuti wojambula zithunziyo anaima galimoto yake kumbali ina ya Sepulveda Boulevard ndipo anayesa kujambula chithunzi cha apolisi asanawoloke msewu ndi kupitiriza, zomwe zinapangitsa wapolisi wa California Highway Patrol yemwe anali kutsogolera kuimitsa magalimoto kumulamula kuti awoloke, kawiri.

en: According to police, the driver of the vehicle that hit the photographer is unlikely to face criminal charges.
ny: Malinga ndi kunena kwa apolisi, woyendetsa galimoto amene anagunda wojambula zithunziyo sakhala ndi mlandu.

en: With only eighteen medals available a day, a number of countries have failed to make the medal podium.
ny: Popeza kuti tsiku lililonse anthu amapatsidwa mendulo 18 zokha, mayiko ambiri alephera kupeza mendulo.

en: They include the Netherlands, with Anna Jochemsen finishing ninth in the women's standing class in the Super-G yesterday, and Finland with Katja Saarinen finishing tenth in the same event.
ny: Ena mwa iwo ndi dziko la Netherlands, limene Anna Jochemsen anamaliza pa nambala 9 pa mpikisano wa azimayi wothamanga kwambiri, ndipo dziko la Finland, limene Katja Saarinen anamaliza pa nambala 10 pa mpikisano womwewo.

en: Australia's Mitchell Gourley finished eleventh in the men's standing Super-G. Czech competitor Oldrich Jelinek finished sixteenth in the men's sitting Super-G.
ny: Mitchell Gourley wa ku Australia anamaliza pa nambala 11 mu mpikisano wa amuna oyima pa Super-G. Wopikisana naye wa ku Czech, Oldrich Jelinek, anamaliza pa nambala 16 mu mpikisano wa amuna oyima pa Super-G.

en: Arly Velasquez of Mexico finished fifteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. New Zealand's Adam Hall finished ninth in the men's standing Super-G.
ny: Arly Velasquez wa ku Mexico anamaliza kukhala wa nambala 15 pa mpikisano wa amuna wokhala pansi pa mpando wa Super-G. Adam Hall wa ku New Zealand anamaliza kukhala wa nambala 9 pa mpikisano wa amuna okhala pansi pa mpando wa Super-G.

en: Poland's men's visually impaired skier Maciej Krezel and guide Anna Ogarzynska finished thirteenth in the Super-G. South Korea's Jong Seork Park finished twenty-fourth in the men's sitting Super-G.
ny: Wotsogola wa amuna osaona wa ku Poland Maciej Krezel ndi mtsogoleri wake Anna Ogarzynska anamaliza mpikisano wa Super-G ali pa nambala 13.

en: UN peacekeepers, whom arrived in Haiti after the 2010 earthquake, are being blamed for the spread of the disease which started near the troop's encampment.
ny: Anthu amene anatumizidwa ku Haiti ndi gulu la UN la anthu oteteza mtendere, pambuyo pa chivomerezi cha mu 2010, akuimbidwa mlandu chifukwa cha kufalikira kwa matendawa, amene anayamba pafupi ndi msasa wa asilikaliwo.

en: According to the lawsuit, waste from the UN camp was not properly sanitized, causing bacteria to enter the tributary of the Artibonite River, one of Haiti's largest.
ny: Malinga ndi mlanduwo, zinyalala zochokera ku msasa wa UN sizinayeretsedwe bwino, zimene zinachititsa mabakiteriya kuloŵa m'mtsinje wa Artibonite, womwe ndi umodzi mwa mitsinje ikuluikulu kwambiri ku Haiti.

en: Prior to the arrival of troops, Haiti had not encountered problems related to the disease since the 1800s.
ny: Asanafike asilikali, dziko la Haiti silinakumanepo ndi mavuto okhudzana ndi matendawa kuyambira m'ma 1800.

en: The Haitian Institute for Justice and Democracy has referenced independent studies that suggest the Nepalese UN peacekeeping battalion unknowingly brought the disease to Haiti.
ny: Bungwe la Haiti Institute for Justice and Democracy linatchulapo za kafukufuku wina yemwe anasonyeza kuti gulu la anthu osunga mtendere la ku Nepal linatenga matendawa ku Haiti.

en: Danielle Lantagne, a UN expert on the disease, stated the outbreak was likely caused by the peacekeepers.
ny: Danielle Lantagne, katswiri wa matendawa wa bungwe la United Nations, ananena kuti mwina asilikali oteteza mtendere ndiwo anayambitsa mliriwu.

en: Hamilton confirmed Howard University Hospital admitted the patient in stable condition.
ny: Hamilton anatsimikizira kuti chipatala cha Howard University chinalowetsa wodwalayo m'chipatalacho ndipo anali bwinobwino.

en: The patient had been to Nigeria, where some cases of the Ebola virus have occurred.
ny: Wodwalayo anali atapita ku Nigeria, kumene kwachitika anthu ena odwala Ebola.

en: The hospital has followed protocol for infection control, including separating the patient from others to prevent possible infection of others.
ny: Chipatalachi chatsatira ndondomeko yoletsa matenda, kuphatikizapo kupatula wodwalayo kwa ena kuti asatenge matenda ena.

en: Before The Simpsons Simon had worked on several shows in various positions.
ny: Asanayambe ntchito ya The Simpsons, Simon anagwira ntchito zosiyanasiyana.

en: During the 1980s he worked on shows such as Taxi, Cheers, and The Tracy Ullman Show.
ny: M'zaka za m'ma 1980 anagwira ntchito pa mapulogalamu monga Taxi, Cheers, ndi The Tracy Ullman Show.

en: In 1989 he helped create The Simpsons with Brooks and Groening, and was responsible for hiring the show's first writing team.
ny: Mu 1989 anathandiza kulenga The Simpsons ndi Brooks ndi Groening, ndipo anali ndi udindo wolemba gulu loyamba la olemba.

en: Despite leaving the show in 1993 he kept the title of executive producer, and continued to receive tens of millions of dollars every season in royalties.
ny: Ngakhale kuti anasiya chiwonetserochi mu 1993 iye anasunga dzina la wolemba wamkulu, ndipo anapitiriza kulandira madola mamiliyoni ambiri nyengo iliyonse muzolemba.

en: Earlier the Chinese news agency Xinhua reported a plane to be hijacked.
ny: M'mbuyomo bungwe la nkhani la China la Xinhua linalengeza za ndege imene inagwidwa.

en: Later reports then stated the plane received a bomb threat and was diverted back to Afghanistan, landing in Kandahar.
ny: Malipoti a pambuyo pake ananenanso kuti ndegeyo inalandira chiwopsezo cha bomba ndipo inabwezeretsedwa ku Afghanistan, n'kukagwera ku Kandahar.

en: The early reports say the plane was diverted back to Afghanistan after being denied an emergency landing in Ürümqi.
ny: Malipoti oyambirira akunena kuti ndegeyo inabwezeretsedwa ku Afghanistan pambuyo pa kukanidwa kutera mwadzidzidzi ku Ürümqi.

en: Air accidents are common in Iran, which has an aging fleet that is poorly maintained both for civil and military operations.
ny: Ngozi za ndege n'zofala ku Iran, kumene kuli zombo za nkhondo zimene zikuoneka kuti zikukalamba ndipo sizikusamalidwa bwino pa ntchito za asilikali ndi zankhondo.

en: International sanctions have meant that new aircraft cannot be purchased.
ny: Zilango zapadziko lonse zatanthauza kuti ndege zatsopano sizingagulidwe.

en: Earlier this week, a police helicopter crash killed three people and wounded three more.
ny: Kumayambiriro kwa mlungu uno, ndege ya apolisi inagwera pansi, anthu atatu anaphedwa ndipo ena atatu anavulala.

en: Last month Iran saw its worst air disaster in years when an airliner heading to Armenia crashed, killing the 168 on board.
ny: Mwezi watha Iran inakumana ndi tsoka lalikulu kwambiri la ndege m'zaka zambiri pamene ndege ya anthu oyenda ulendo wopita ku Armenia inagwa, kupha anthu 168 omwe anali m'ndege.

en: The same month saw another airliner overrun a runway at Mashhad and strike a wall, killing seventeen.
ny: Mwezi womwewo ndege ina inathamanga pa msewu wa ndege ku Mashhad n'kugunda khoma, ndipo inapha anthu 17.

en: Aerosmith have cancelled their remaining concerts on their tour.
ny: Aerosmith achotsa ma konsati awo otsala paulendo wawo.

en: The rock band was due to tour the United States and Canada until September 16.
ny: Gulu la rock linali kudzacheza ku United States ndi Canada mpaka pa September 16.

en: They have cancelled the tour after lead singer Steven Tyler was injured after he fell off stage while performing on August 5.
ny: Iwo achotsa ulendowo pambuyo poti woimba wawo Steven Tyler anavulala atagwa pa siteji pamene anali kuchita pa August 5.

en: Murray lost the first set in a tie break after both men held each and every serve in the set.
ny: Murray anataya gawo loyamba m'khola la tie break pambuyo poti amuna onse aŵiriwo anali ndi gawo lililonse m'gulu.

en: Del Potro had the early advantage in the second set, but this too required a tie break after reaching 6-6.
ny: Del Potro anali ndi mwayi woyambirira mu seti yachiwiri, koma izi zinaperekanso mwayi wopuma pambuyo pofika 6-6.

en: Potro received treatment to his shoulder at this point but managed to return to the game.
ny: Potro anathandizidwa pa bondo lake koma anatha kubwerera ku masewerawo.

en: The program started at 8:30 p.m. local time (15.00 UTC).
ny: Pulogalamuyi inayamba pa 8:30 p.m. nthawi ya m'deralo (15.00 UTC).

en: Famous singers across the country presented bhajans, or devotional songs, to Shri Shyam's feet.
ny: Oimba otchuka m'dziko lonselo anapereka nyimbo zachikondi, kapena kuti zachikondi, kwa Shri Shyam.

en: Singer Sanju Sharma started the evening, followed by Jai Shankar Choudhary. esented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him.
ny: Woimba Sanju Sharma anayamba madzulo, kenako Jai Shankar Choudhary. anaimba chhappan bhog bhajan. Woimba, Raju Khandelwal anali naye.

en: Then, Lakkha Singh took the lead in singing the bhajans.
ny: Kenako, Lakkha Singh anatsogolera poimba ma bhajans.

en: 108 plates of Chhappan Bhog (in Hinduism, 56 different edible items, like, sweets, fruits, nuts, dishes etc. which are offered to deity) were served to Baba Shyam.
ny: Mabotolo 108 a Chhappan Bhog (mu Chihindu, zinthu 56 zosiyana zodyera, monga, maswiti, zipatso, mtedza, mbale ndi zina zotero zomwe zimaperekedwa kwa mulungu) zinaperekedwa kwa Baba Shyam.

en: Lakkha Singh presented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him.
ny: Lakkha Singh anaperekanso chhappan bhog bhajan.

en: At Thursday's keynote presentation of the Tokyo Game Show, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata unveiled the controller design for the company's new Nintendo Revolution console.
ny: Pa nkhani yaikulu ya Lachinayi pa Tokyo Game Show, pulezidenti wa Nintendo Satoru Iwata anaulula kapangidwe ka makina a Nintendo Revolution.

en: Resembling a television remote, the controller uses two sensors placed near the user's television to triangulate its position in three-dimensional space.
ny: Pofanana ndi wailesi yakanema, chipangizocho chimagwiritsa ntchito masensa awiri amene amaikidwa pafupi ndi wailesi yakanema ya wogwiritsa ntchitoyo kuti adziŵe malo ake m'mlengalenga.

en: This will allow players to control actions and movements in video games by moving the device through the air.
ny: Zimenezi zidzathandiza osewera kuti aziyendetsa zinthu m'maseŵera a pakompyuta mwa kusuntha chipangizocho m'mlengalenga.

en: Giancarlo Fisichella lost control of his car and ended the race very soon after the start.
ny: Giancarlo Fisichella anasiya kuyendetsa galimoto yake ndipo anasiya mpikisanowo mwamsanga.

en: His teammate Fernando Alonso was in the lead for most of the race, but ended it right after his pit-stop, probably because a badly tucked right front wheel.
ny: Mnzake wa m'gulu lake Fernando Alonso anali kutsogolera pa mpikisano wonsewo, koma anasiya mpikisanowo atangomaliza kumene kupuma m'mabokosi, mwina chifukwa cha gudumu lakutsogolo lamanja lomwe linapindika kwambiri.

en: Michael Schumacher ended his race not long after Alonso, because of the suspension damage in the numerous battles during the race.
ny: Michael Schumacher anasiya mpikisano wake patangopita nthawi yochepa kuchokera pamene Alonso anathamanga chifukwa cha kuwonongeka kwa makina ake a suspension.

en: "She’s very cute and sings quite well, too," he said according to a transcript of the news conference.
ny: "Iye ndi wokongola kwambiri ndipo amaimba bwino kwambiri", iye anatero malinga ndi mawu a msonkhano wa atolankhani.

en: "I was moved every time we did a rehearsal on this, from the bottom of my heart."
ny: "Ndinkakhudzidwa nthaŵi iliyonse pamene tinali kuchita phunziro pa zimenezi, kuchokera pansi pa mtima wanga".

en: Around 3 minutes into the launch, an on-board camera showed numerous pieces of insulation foam break away from the fuel tank.
ny: Patatha mphindi zitatu, kamera ina imene inali m'chombocho inasonyeza kuti zigawo zambiri za thovu la kutchinjiriza zinatha kuchoka m'tanki ya mafuta.

en: However, they are not thought to have caused any damage to the shuttle.
ny: Komabe, sakuganiza kuti anawononga shuttle.

en: NASA's shuttle program chief N. Wayne Hale Jr. said the foam had fallen "after the time we are concerned about."
ny: Mkulu wa NASA wa pulogalamu ya ndege za m'mlengalenga N. Wayne Hale Jr. anati thovu linagwa "pambuyo pa nthaŵi imene tikudera nkhaŵa".

en: Five minutes into the display a wind starts rolling in, about a minute later, the wind is reaching 70km/h... then the rain comes, but so hard and so large that it slaps your skin like a needle, then hail fell from the sky, people panicking and screaming and running over each other.
ny: Patatha mphindi zisanu, mphepo inayamba kuwomba, ndipo patapita mphindi imodzi, mphepoyo inali kuyenda pa liŵiro la makilomita 70 pa ola limodzi. Kenako kunagwa mvula, koma inali yolimba kwambiri ndipo inali yaikulu kwambiri moti inagunda khungu la munthu ngati singano, kenako matalala anagwa kuchokera kumwamba, anthu anayamba kuchita mantha, kufuula ndi kuthamangira pamwamba pa ena.

en: I lost my sister and her friend, and on my way there were two disabled people in wheelchairs, people just jumping over and pushing them," Armand Versace said.
ny: Ndinataya mlongo wanga ndi bwenzi lake, ndipo panjira ndinali ndi anthu awiri olumala omwe anali pa njinga za olumala, anthu anali kungowathamangira ndi kuwaponya", anatero Armand Versace.

en: NHK also reported that the Kashiwazaki Kariwa nuclear power plant in Niigata prefecture was operating normally.
ny: NHK inanenanso kuti malo opangira mphamvu za nyukiliya a Kashiwazaki Kariwa m'chigawo cha Niigata anali kugwira ntchito bwinobwino.

en: Hokuriku Electric Power Co. reported no effects from the earthquake and that the Number 1 and 2 reactors at its Shika nuclear power plant were shut down.
ny: Kampani ya Hokuriku Electric Power inati chivomerezichi sichinawononge zinthu ndipo makina a No. 1 ndi 2 a pakampani yake ya nyukiliya ya Shika atsekedwa.

en: It is reported that some 9400 homes in the region are without water and approximately 100 without electricity.
ny: Akuti nyumba pafupifupi 9400 m'derali zilibe madzi ndipo pafupifupi 100 zilibe magetsi.

en: Some roads have been damaged, railway service interrupted in the affected areas, and the Noto Airport in Ishikawa prefecture remains closed.
ny: Misewu ina yawonongeka, sitima za pamtunda zinasweka m'madera amene anawonongedwa, ndipo bwalo la ndege la Noto ku chigawo cha Ishikawa linatsekedwa.

en: One bomb exploded outside the governor general's office.
ny: Bomba lina linaphulika kunja kwa ofesi ya kazembe wamkulu.

en: Three more bombs exploded near government buildings in a period of two hours.
ny: Mabomba ena atatu anaphulika pafupi ndi nyumba za boma m'maola aŵiri.

en: Some reports put the official death toll at eight, and official reports confirm that up to 30 were injured; but final numbers are not yet known.
ny: Malipoti ena amanena kuti anthu 8 anafa, ndipo malipoti ena amatsimikizira kuti anthu 30 anavulala; koma chiwerengero chomaliza sichinazindikiridwebe.

en: Both cyanuric acid and melamine were found in urine samples from pets that died after consuming contaminated pet food.
ny: Asidi ya cyanuric ndi melamine zinapezeka m'zipatso za mkodzo wa ziweto zimene zinafa chifukwa chodya chakudya cha ziweto.

en: The two compounds react with one another to form crystals that may block kidney function, researchers at the university said.
ny: Akatswiri ofufuza a pa yunivesiteyi anati, zinthu ziwirizi zimagwirizana n'kupanga makhiristo amene amalepheretsa impso kugwira ntchito.

en: The researchers observed crystals formed in cat urine by the addition of melamine and cyanuric acid.
ny: Ofufuzawo anaona kuti madzi a m'mimba mwa mphakawo anapanga makhiristo chifukwa cha kuwonjezera kwa melamine ndi cyanuric acid.

en: The composition of these crystals matches those found in the urine of affected pets when compared by infrared spectroscopy (FTIR).
ny: Ma crystals amenewa ali ndi maonekedwe ofanana ndi a ziweto zimene zimapuma ngati atayerekezera ndi ma crystals a m'maselo a nyamazi pogwiritsa ntchito makina ojambula zithunzi a infrared spectroscopy (FTIR).

en: I don't know if you realize it or not, but most of the goods from Central America came into this country duty-free.
ny: Sindikudziwa ngati mukudziwa kapena ayi, koma katundu wambiri wochokera ku Central America anabwera m'dziko lino popanda msonkho.

en: Yet eighty percent of our goods were taxed through tariffs in Central American countries. we treat you.
ny: Komabe, 80 peresenti ya katundu wathu anali ndi misonkho m'mayiko a ku Central America.

en: That didn't seem to make sense to me; it certainly wasn't fair.
ny: Zimenezi sizinali zomveka kwa ine; zinalidi zosalungama.

en: All I say to people is you treat us the way we treat you.
ny: Zonse zimene ndimanena kwa anthu n'zakuti muzitiganizira mmene ife timakuchitirani.

en: California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed into law a bill that bans the sale or rental of violent video games to minors.
ny: Bwanamkubwa wa California Arnold Schwarzenegger anasaina lamulo loletsa kugulitsa kapena kubwereka ana masewera a pakompyuta achiwawa.

en: The bill requires violent video games sold in the state of California to be labeled with a decal reading "18" and makes their sale to a minor punishable by a fine of $1000 per offense.
ny: Lamuloli limafuna kuti maseŵera a kanema achiwawa amene amagulitsidwa m'boma la California azilembedwa ndi chikwangwani cholembedwa kuti "18" ndipo limapangitsa kuti kugulitsa kwawo kwa mwana wosakwanitsa zaka khumi ndi chimodzi kulipiritsidwe ndi chindapusa cha madola 1000 pa mlandu uliwonse.

en: The Director of Public Prosecutions, Kier Starmer QC, gave a statement this morning announcing the prosecution of both Huhne and Pryce.
ny: Mkulu wa Boma la Boma, Kier Starmer QC, anapereka mawu m'mawa uno kulengeza za kuzenga mlandu Huhne ndi Pryce.

en: Huhne has resigned and he will be replaced in the Cabinet by Ed Davey MP. Norman Lamb MP is expected to take the Business Minister job Davey is vacating.
ny: Huhne wapereka chicholowa ndipo adzasinthidwa m'kabineti ndi membala wa Ed Davey.

en: Huhne and Pryce are scheduled to appear at the Westminster Magistrates Court on February 16.
ny: Huhne ndi Pryce akuyembekezeka kuonekera ku Khoti la Westminster pa February 16.

en: The fatalities were Nicholas Alden, 25, and Zachary Cuddeback, 21. Cuddeback had been the driver.
ny: Anthu amene anafa anali Nicholas Alden, wazaka 25, ndi Zachary Cuddeback, wazaka 21.

en: Edgar Veguilla received arm and jaw wounds while Kristoffer Schneider was left requiring reconstructive surgery for his face.
ny: Edgar Veguilla anavulala m'manja ndi m'nsagwada pamene Kristoffer Schneider anatsala akufunika kuchitidwa opaleshoni yochotsa nkhope.

en: Uka's weapon failed whilst pointed at a fifth man's head. Schneider has ongoing pain, blindness in one eye, a missing section of skull and a face rebuilt from titanium.
ny: Zida za Uka zinaphonya pamene zinalunjika mutu wa munthu wachisanu.

en: Schneider testified via videolink from a USAF base in his homeland.
ny: Schneider anapereka umboni kudzera pa kanema kuchokera ku likulu la USAF m'dziko lake.

en: Beyond Wednesday's event, Carpanedo competed in two individual races at the Championships.
ny: Kupatula pa mpikisano wa Lachitatu, Carpanedo anapikisana nawo m'mapikisano aŵiri pa Mpikisanowo.

en: Her first was the Slalom, where she earned a Did Not Finish in her first run. 36 of the 116 competitors had the same result in that race.
ny: Iye anayamba ndi mpikisano wothamanga wotchedwa Slalom, kumene anapeza mphoto ya Did Not Finish pa mpikisano wake woyamba.

en: Her other race, the Giant Slalom, saw her finish in tenth in the women's sitting group with a combined run time of 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minutes slower than first place finisher Austrian Claudia Loesch and 1:09.02 minutes slower than the ninth place finisher Gyöngyi Dani of Hungary.
ny: Mpikisano wake wina, wa Giant Slalom, anam'chititsa kumaliza pampando wa 10 m'gulu la azimayi okhala pansi ndi nthawi yonse ya 4:41.30, 2:11.60 mphindi pang'onopang'ono kuposa woyamba kumaliza Claudia Loesch wa ku Austria ndi 1:09.02 mphindi pang'onopang'ono kuposa womaliza wa nambala 9 Gyöngyi Dani wa ku Hungary.

en: Four skiers in the women's sitting group failed to finish their runs, and 45 of the 117 total skiers in the Giant Slalom failed to rank in the race.
ny: Ochita maseŵera a ski anayi m'gulu la akazi amene anali kukhala pansi analephera kumaliza kuthamanga kwawo, ndipo 45 mwa ochita maseŵera a ski okwana 117 mu Giant Slalom analephera kuloŵa m'mpikisanowo.

en: The Madhya Pradesh Police recovered the stolen laptop and mobile phone.
ny: Apolisi a ku Madhya Pradesh anapeza laputopu ndi foni imene anaba.

en: Deputy Inspector General D K Arya said, "We have arrested five persons who raped the Swiss woman and recovered her mobile and laptop".
ny: Wachiwiri kwa mkulu wa oyang'anira zachitetezo D. K. Arya anati, "Tagwira anthu asanu amene anagwirira mkazi wa ku Switzerland uja ndi kupeza foni yake yam'manja ndi laputopu".

en: The accused are named as Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar and Vishnu Kanjar.
ny: Omangidwawo amatchedwa Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar ndi Vishnu Kanjar.

en: Police superintendent Chandra Shekhar Solanki said the accused appeared in court with covered faces.
ny: Woyang'anira apolisi Chandra Shekhar Solanki anati woimbidwa mlanduyo anaonekera m'khoti ndi nkhope zophimbidwa.

en: Although three people were inside the house when the car impacted it, none of them were hurt.
ny: Ngakhale kuti anthu atatu anali m'nyumbamo pamene galimotoyo inagunda nyumbayo, palibe amene anavulala.

en: However, the driver sustained serious injuries to the head.
ny: Komabe, dalaivalayo anavulala kwambiri kumutu.

en: The road where the crash happened was temporarily closed while emergency services freed the driver from the red Audi TT.
