ny: Zitsulo zoyendetsera mpikisano ndi zinthu zimene zimagwirizanitsa mapazi a wokwera pahatchiyo ndipo zimagwidwa mbali zonse ziwiri za mpikisanowo.

en: They provide greater stability for the rider but can have safety concerns due to the potential for a rider's feet to get stuck in them.
ny: Amapereka kukhazikika kwakukulu kwa wokwera koma akhoza kukhala ndi nkhawa za chitetezo chifukwa cha kuthekera kwa mapazi a wokwera kuti agwire nawo.

en: If a rider is thrown from a horse but has a foot caught in the stirrup, they could be dragged if the horse runs away. To minimize this risk, a number of safety precautions can be taken.
ny: Ngati wokwera pahatchi waponyedwa pansi koma phazi lake laphwanyidwa m'mphuno, akhoza kukokedwa ngati hatchiyo yathawa.

en: First, most riders wear riding boots with a heel and a smooth, quite narrow, sole.
ny: Choyamba, okwera ambiri amavala nsapato za kukwera zokhala ndi chidendene ndi nsapato yosalala, yopapatiza.

en: Next, some saddles, particularly English saddles, have safety bars that allow a stirrup leather to fall off the saddle if pulled backwards by a falling rider.
ny: Kenaka, mathalauza ena, makamaka mathalauza a Chingelezi, ali ndi mipiringidzo yotetezera imene imalola chikopa cha thunthu kugwera pansi ngati wokwera pa mathalauza amene wagwa atamukoka kumbuyo.

en: Cochamó Valley - Chile's premier climbing destination, known as the Yosemite of South America, with a variety of granite big walls and crags.
ny: Chigwa cha Cochamó - malo abwino kwambiri okwera mapiri ku Chile, otchedwa Yosemite wa ku South America, okhala ndi makoma ndi miyala ikuluikulu ya granite.

en: Summits include breath-taking views from peaks. Climbers from all parts of the world are continually establishing new routes amongst its endless potential of walls.
ny: Anthu okwera mapiri ochokera m'madera osiyanasiyana padziko lapansi akuyenda m'njira zosiyanasiyana m'mphepete mwa mapiri a dzikoli.

en: Downhill snowsports, which include skiing and snowboarding, are popular sports involving sliding down snow-covered terrain with skis or a snowboard attached to your feet.
ny: Maseŵera a chipale chofeŵa otsetsereka, monga kukwera mapiri ndi kukwera pa chipale chofeŵa, ndi maseŵera otchuka amene amaphatikizapo kutsetsereka m'malo oundana ndi chipale chofeŵa ndi ma skis kapena snowboard yokhomedwa kumapazi anu.

en: Skiing is a major travelling activity with many enthusiasts, occasionally known as "ski bums," planning entire vacations around skiing at a particular location.
ny: Kupalasa ski ndi ntchito yaikulu yoyendayenda ndi okonda ambiri, nthaŵi zina otchedwa "ski bums", kukonzekera maholide onse kuzungulira kupalasa ski pamalo enaake.

en: The idea of skiing is very old — cave paintings depicting skiers date back as far as 5000 BC!
ny: Lingaliro la kukwera ski n'lakale kwambiri  Zithunzi za m'mapanga zosonyeza okwera ski zinalembedwa kale kwambiri monga mu 5000 B.C.E.!

en: Downhill skiing as a sport goes back to at least the 17th century, and in 1861 the first recreational ski club was opened by Norwegians in Australia.
ny: Maseŵera a skiing oyenda pansi pa mapiri anayamba m'zaka za m'ma 1700, ndipo mu 1861 anthu a ku Norway anatsegula kalabu yoyamba yopita ku ski ku Australia.

en: Backpacking by ski: This activity is also called backcountry ski, ski touring or ski hiking.
ny: Kupalasa chikwama cha m'mbuyo pa ski: Ntchito imeneyi imatchedwanso kuti ski ya m'mbuyo, ski touring kapena ski hiking.

en: It is related to but usually not involving alpine style ski touring or mountaineering, the latter ones done in steep terrain and requiring much stiffer skis and boots.
ny: Ndi ofanana ndi maulendo a ski kapena kukwera mapiri, koma nthawi zambiri samaphatikizapo kukwera mapiri, omwe amachitika pamtunda wosanjikiza ndipo amafunikira ski ndi nsapato zolimba kwambiri.

en: Think of the skiing route as of a similar hiking route.
ny: Taganizirani za njira ya ski ngati njira yofanana ya kuyenda.

en: In good conditions you will be able to cover somewhat greater distances than walking – but only very seldom you will get the speeds of cross country skiing without a heavy backpack in groomed tracks.
ny: M'mikhalidwe yabwino mudzatha kuyenda mtunda wautali kuposa kuyenda  koma kaŵirikaŵiri simudzatha kuthamanga ngati mmene mungachitire mukamayenda pa ski popanda thumba lolemera m'misewu yokonzedwa bwino.

en: Europe is a continent that is relatively small but with many independent countries. Under normal circumstances, travelling through multiple countries would mean having to go through visa applications and passport control multiple times.
ny: Europe ndi dziko laling'ono koma lili ndi mayiko ambiri odziimira okha, ndipo ngati munthu akufuna kupita m'mayiko osiyanasiyana, ayenera kupempha visa ndi kufufuza pasipoti kangapo.

en: The Schengen zone, however, works somewhat like one country in this respect.
ny: Komabe, dera la Schengen limagwira ntchito ngati dziko limodzi pankhani imeneyi.

en: As long as you stay in this zone, you can generally cross borders without going through passport control checkpoints again.
ny: Ngati mukukhalabe m'dera limeneli, mukhoza kudutsa malire popanda kudutsa m'malo oyang'anira mapasipoti.

en: Similarly, by having a Schengen visa, you do not need to apply for visas to each of the Schengen member countries separately, hence saving time, money and paperwork.
ny: Mofananamo, pokhala ndi visa ya Schengen, simufunikira kupempha visa ku dziko lililonse la Schengen payekha, motero mumapulumutsa nthaŵi, ndalama ndi mapepala.

en: There is no universal definition for which manufactured items are antiques. Some tax agencies define goods older than 100 years as antiques.
ny: Palibe mfundo iliyonse imene imasonyeza kuti zinthu zimene zinapangidwa kale n'zokalekale.

en: The definition has geographic variations, where the age limit might be shorter in places such as North America than in Europe.
ny: Tanthauzo limeneli limasiyanasiyana malinga ndi malo, ndipo malire a zaka angakhale aafupi m'madera monga ku North America kusiyana ndi ku Ulaya.

en: Handicraft products might be defined as antiques, though they are younger than similar mass-produced goods.
ny: Zinthu zopangidwa ndi manja zingafotokozedwe kuti ndi zakale, ngakhale kuti ndi zachikale kuposa zinthu zofananazo zopangidwa ndi anthu ambiri.

en: Reindeer husbandry is an important livelihood among the Sámi and the culture surrounding the trade is important also for many with other professions.
ny: Anthu a ku Samia amakonda kwambiri ulimi wa njati ndipo chikhalidwe chawo chimawathandiza kuti azigwira ntchito zina.

en: Even traditionally, though, not all Sámi have been involved in big scale reindeer husbandry, but lived from fishing, hunting and similar, having reindeer mostly as draft animals.
ny: Ngakhale kuti anthu a ku Samasi akhala akuweta ziweto zambiri, sikuti onse amachita zimenezi, koma ankadyera nsomba, kusaka ndi zina zotero.

en: Today many Sámi work in modern trades. Tourism is an important income in Sápmi, the Sámi area.
ny: Masiku ano, anthu ambiri a ku Samasi amagwira ntchito zamakono ndipo amapeza ndalama zambiri pochita zokopa alendo.

en: Though it is widely used, especially among non-Romani, the word "Gypsy" is often considered offensive because of its associations with negative stereotypes and inaccurate perceptions of Romani people.
ny: Ngakhale kuti mawu akuti "Gypsy" amagwiritsidwa ntchito kwambiri, makamaka pakati pa anthu omwe si Aroma, mawuwa amaonedwa kuti ndi okhumudwitsa chifukwa chakuti anthuwo amawaona molakwika ndiponso amawaona molakwika.

en: If the country you will be visiting becomes subject to a travel advisory, your travel health insurance or your trip cancellation insurance may be affected.
ny: Ngati dziko limene mudzayendere likhala ndi malangizo a ulendo, inshuwalansi yanu ya matenda kapena inshuwalansi yanu ya kuchotsedwa kwa ulendo ingakhudzidwe.

en: You may also wish to consult the advice of governments other than your own, but their advice is designed for their citizens.
ny: Mungafunenso kupempha malangizo kwa maboma ena, koma malangizo awo ndi opita kwa nzika zawo.

en: As one example, American citizens in the Middle East might face different situations from Europeans or Arabs.
ny: Mwachitsanzo, nzika za ku America za ku Middle East zingakumane ndi mavuto osiyanasiyana kusiyana ndi a ku Ulaya kapena a ku Arabia.

en: Advisories are merely a brief summary of the political situation in one country.
ny: Malangizo ndi chidule chabe cha mkhalidwe wa ndale m'dziko linalake.

en: The views presented are often cursory, general and oversimplified compared to the more detailed information available elsewhere.
ny: Maganizo amene amaperekedwa kaŵirikaŵiri amakhala aatali, a mtundu wonse, ndi osavuta kuwaganizira poyerekezera ndi chidziŵitso chatsatanetsatane chimene chilipo kwina.

en: Severe weather is the generic term for any dangerous weather phenomenon with the potential to cause damage, serious social disruption, or loss of human life.
ny: Nyengo yoipa ndi mawu ofotokoza za ngozi iliyonse ya nyengo imene ingawononge zinthu, kusokoneza anthu kwambiri, kapena kupha anthu.

en: Severe weather can occur anywhere in the world, and there are different types of it, which can depend on geography, topography, and atmospheric conditions.
ny: Nyengo yoipa ingakhale paliponse padziko lapansi, ndipo pali mitundu yosiyanasiyana ya nyengo yoipa, imene imadalira malo, malo, ndi mkhalidwe wa mlengalenga.

en: High winds, hail, excessive precipitation, and wildfires are forms and effects of severe weather, as are thunderstorms, tornadoes, waterspouts, and cyclones.
ny: Mphepo yamphamvu, matalala, mvula yambiri, ndi moto wa m'nkhalango ndizo mitundu ndi zotsatira za nyengo yoipa, monganso mphepo yamkuntho, mphepo yamkuntho, madzi amphamvu, ndi mphepo yamkuntho.

en: Regional and seasonal severe weather phenomena include blizzards, snowstorms, ice storms, and dust storms.
ny: M'madera ena komanso nyengo zina, nyengo imakhala yoipa kwambiri ndipo pamakhala mvula yamkuntho, mvula yamkuntho, mvula yamkuntho ya chipale chofewa ndiponso mvula yamkuntho.

en: Travellers are strongly advised to be aware of any risk of severe weather affecting their area as they may affect any travel plans.
ny: Alendo akulimbikitsidwa kuti azidziŵa za ngozi iliyonse ya nyengo yoipa imene ingakhudze dera lawo chifukwa ingakhudze mapulani onse a ulendo.

en: Anyone planning a visit to a country that could be considered a war zone should get professional training.
ny: Aliyense amene akufuna kupita ku dziko limene lingaonedwe ngati malo a nkhondo ayenera kuphunzitsidwa ntchito.

en: A search of the Internet for 'Hostile environment course' will probably provide the address of a local company.
ny: Kufufuza pa Intaneti kuti mupeze mawu akuti 'Kosi ya M'dera Losafuna Kulankhulana' kungakuthandizeni kupeza adiresi ya kampani ya m'deralo.

en: A course will normally cover all the issues discussed here in far greater detail, usually with practical experience.
ny: Maphunziroŵa kaŵirikaŵiri amakhala okhudza nkhani zonse zimene zafotokozedwa m'nkhani ino mwatsatanetsatane, ndipo nthaŵi zambiri amakhala ndi chidziŵitso cha m'nthaŵi yeniyeni.

en: A course will normally be from 2-5 days and will involve role play, a lot of first aid and sometimes weapons training.
ny: Maphunziroŵa amakhala a masiku 2 mpaka 5 ndipo amaphatikizapo maseŵero a maudindo, chithandizo choyambirira chambiri ndipo nthaŵi zina kuphunzitsidwa za zida.

en: Books and magazines dealing with wilderness survival are common, but publications dealing with war zones are few.
ny: Mabuku ndi magazini onena za kupulumuka m'chipululu n'zofala, koma mabuku onena za nkhondo ndi ochepa.

en: Voyagers planning sex reassignment surgery abroad must ensure they're carrying valid documents for the return trip.
ny: Alendo amene akufuna kuchita opaleshoni yosintha kugonana kunja ayenera kuonetsetsa kuti ali ndi zikalata zoyenerera ulendo wobwerera.

en: The willingness of governments to issue passports with gender not stated (X) or documents updated to match a desired name and gender varies.
ny: Boma limapereka mapasipoti amene alibe dzina la mwamuna kapena mkazi (X) kapena zikalata zimene zili ndi dzina ndi mwamuna kapena mkazi.

en: Willingness of foreign governments to honour these documents is just as widely variable.
ny: Kufunitsitsa kwa maboma akunja kulemekeza zikalata zimenezi kumasiyanasiyana mofanana.

en: Searches at security checkpoints have also become far more intrusive in the post-September 11, 2001 era.
ny: Kusaka pa malo osungirako zinthu kunakhalanso kovuta kwambiri pambuyo pa September 11, 2001.

en: Pre-operative transgender people should not expect to pass through the scanners with their privacy and dignity intact.
ny: Anthu omwe ali ndi vuto la kusinthasintha maonekedwe asanachitire opaleshoni sayenera kuyembekezera kuti adzapyola pa makinawo ndi ufulu wawo wokhala ndi moyo wawo waumwini ndi ulemu wawo.

en: Rip currents are the returning flow from waves breaking off the beach, often at a reef or similar.
ny: Madzi a m'mphepete mwa nyanja ndi amene amabwera kuchokera ku mafunde amene amabwera kuchokera m'mphepete mwa nyanja, kawirikawiri pa miyala ya m'nyanja kapena zinthu zina zofanana ndi zimenezi.

en: Due to the underwater topology the return flow is concentrated at a few deeper sections, and a fast current to deep water may form there.
ny: Chifukwa cha malo amene madziwo ali pansi pa madzi, madziwo amabwera m'madera ena akuya kwambiri ndipo m'madzi akuyawo mungayambe kuyenda madziwo mofulumira.

en: Most deaths happen as result of fatigue trying to swim back against the current, which may be impossible.
ny: Anthu ambiri amafa chifukwa cha kutopa pamene akuyesetsa kusambira motsutsana ndi mtsinje, zimene zingakhale zosatheka.

en: As soon as you get out of the current, swimming back is no more difficult than normally.
ny: Mukangotuluka mumtsinje, kubwerera kumtunda sikumakhala kovuta kwambiri kuposa mmene mumachitira nthawi zonse.

en: Try aiming somewhere where you are not caught again or, depending on your skills and on whether you have been noticed, you might want to wait for rescue.
ny: Yesani kuika chandamale chanu pamalo amene simungapezekenso, kapena, malinga ndi luso lanu ndiponso ngati ena akudziwa, mungafune kudikira kuti anthu akupulumutseni.

en: Re-entry shock comes on sooner than culture shock (there's less of a honeymoon phase), lasts longer, and can be more severe.
ny: Kusokonezeka kwa kuloŵererako kumachitika mwamsanga kusiyana ndi kusokonezeka kwa chikhalidwe (palibe nthaŵi ya mwezi waukwati), kumatenga nthaŵi yaitali, ndipo kungakhale koopsa kwambiri.

en: Travellers who had an easy time adjusting to the new culture sometimes have a particularly hard time readjusting to their native culture.
ny: Anthu amene amayenda m'madera ena n'kumakhazikika mosavuta, nthawi zina amavutika kwambiri kuti azolowere chikhalidwe cha kwawo.

en: When returning home after living abroad, you've adapted to the new culture and lost some of your habits from your home culture.
ny: Mukabwerera kwawo mutakhala kunja, mwakhala mukusintha chikhalidwe chanu chatsopano ndipo mwaiwala miyambo ina ya m'dziko lanu.

en: When you went abroad at first, people were probably patient and understanding, knowing that travellers in a new country need to adapt.
ny: Pamene munapita ku dziko lina poyamba, anthu anali oleza mtima ndi omvetsetsa, podziŵa kuti oyenda m'dziko latsopano ayenera kuzoloŵera.

en: People may not anticipate that patience and understanding are also necessary for travellers returning home.
ny: Anthu sangaganize kuti kuleza mtima ndi kumvetsetsa n'kofunikanso kwa apaulendo obwerera kwawo.

en: The pyramid sound and light show is one of the most interesting things in the area for kids.
ny: Chionetsero cha kuunika ndi phokoso cha piramidi ndi chimodzi mwa zinthu zosangalatsa kwambiri m'derali kwa ana.

en: You can see the pyramids in the dark and you can see them in silence before the show begins.
ny: Mukhoza kuona mapiramidiwo mumdima ndipo mukhoza kuwaona mwakachetechete pamaso pa chionetserocho.

en: Usually you always here the sound of tourists and vendors. The story of the sound and light is just like a story book.
ny: Nthawi zambiri mumamva phokoso la alendo ndi ogulitsa.

en: The Sphinx is set as the backdrop and the narrator of a long story.
ny: Sphinx ndi amene amafotokoza nkhani yaitali.

en: The scenes are displayed on the pyramids and the different pyramids are lit up.
ny: Zithunzizo zimasonyezedwa pa mapiramidi ndipo mapiramidi osiyanasiyana amaunikiridwa.

en: South Shetland Islands, discovered in 1819, are claimed by several nations and have the most bases, with sixteen active in 2020.
ny: Zilumba za South Shetland, zomwe zinapezeka mu 1819, zimanenedwa ndi mayiko angapo ndipo zili ndi malo ambiri, pomwe khumi ndi asanu ndi limodzi akugwira ntchito mu 2020.

en: The archipelago lies 120 km north of the Peninsula. The largest is King George Island with the settlement of Villa Las Estrellas.
ny: Zilumbazi zili pamtunda wa makilomita 120 kumpoto kwa chilumbachi.

en: Others include Livingston Island, and Deception where the flooded caldera of a still-active volcano provides a spectacular natural harbour.
ny: Zina zikuphatikizapo chilumba cha Livingston, ndi Deception kumene madzi osefukira a phiri laphiri lotentha amathandiza kuti pakhale doko labwino kwambiri.

en: Ellsworth Land is the region south of the Peninsula, bounded by the Bellingshausen Sea.
ny: Dziko la Ellsworth ndi dera lomwe lili kum'mwera kwa chilumbachi, ndipo lili ndi nyanja ya Bellingshausen.

en: The mountains of the Peninsula here merge into the plateau, then re-emerge to form the 360 km chain of the Ellsworth Mountains, bisected by the Minnesota Glacier.
ny: Mapiri a ku Peninsula pano amasakanikirana ndi mapiri a m'dera la mapiri, kenako n'kudzuka n'kupanga mapiri a Ellsworth, omwe ali ndi mtunda wa makilomita 360.

en: The northern part or Sentinel Range has Antarctica's highest mountains, the Vinson Massif, peaking at 4892 m Mount Vinson.
ny: Mbali ya kumpoto kapena Sentinel Range ili ndi mapiri apamwamba kwambiri ku Antarctica, Vinson Massif, yomwe ili pamtunda wa mamita 4892.

en: In remote locations, without cell phone coverage, a satellite phone may be your only option.
ny: Kumalo akutali, kumene kulibe ma telefoni a m'manja, foni ya m'mlengalenga ingakhale njira yokhayo imene mungasankhe.

en: A satellite phone is not generally a replacement for a mobile phone, as you have to be outdoors with clear line of sight to the satellite to make a phone call.
ny: Foni ya pa satellite siimaloŵa m'malo mwa foni yam'manja, chifukwa chakuti kuti muimbire foni muyenera kukhala panja ndi satellite kuti muone bwinobwino.

en: The service is frequently used by shipping, including pleasure craft, as well as expeditions who have remote data and voice needs.
ny: Ntchitoyi imagwiritsidwa ntchito kawirikawiri ndi oyendetsa sitima zapamadzi, kuphatikizapo zombo zosangalatsa, komanso maulendo omwe ali ndi deta yakutali ndi mawu.

en: Your local telephone service provider should be able to give more information about connecting to this service.
ny: Wopereka ma telefoni wa m'dera lanu ayenera kukuuzani zambiri zokhudza kugwirizana ndi ma telefoni.

en: An increasingly more popular option for those planning a gap-year is to travel and learn.
ny: Njira ina yotchuka kwambiri kwa anthu amene akukonzekera kukhala ndi chaka cha tchuthi ndi kuyenda ndi kuphunzira.

en: This is especially popular with school leavers, allowing them to take a year out before university, without compromising their education.
ny: Zimenezi zimakonda kwambiri anthu amene amasiya sukulu, chifukwa zimawalola kuti asamalire chaka chimodzi asanapite ku yunivesite, popanda kuchepetsa maphunziro awo.

en: In many cases, enrolling on a gap-year course abroad can actually improve your chances of moving into higher education back in your home country.
ny: Nthaŵi zambiri, kulembetsa maphunziro a chaka chimodzi kunja kwa sukulu kungakuthandizeni kuti mupeze mwayi wopita ku maphunziro apamwamba m'dziko lanu.

en: Typically there will be a tuition fee to enroll in these educational programs.
ny: Kaŵirikaŵiri padzakhala malipiro a maphunziro kuti mulembetse m'maphunziro ameneŵa.

en: Finland is a great boating destination. The "Land of a thousand lakes" has thousands of islands too, in the lakes and in the coastal archipelagos.
ny: Dziko la Finland ndi malo abwino kwambiri opita kukayenda pa bwato. "Dziko la nyanja zikwi" lili ndi zilumba zikwizikwi, m'nyanja ndi m'zilumba za m'mphepete mwa nyanja.

en: In the archipelagos and lakes you do not necessarily need a yacht.
ny: M'zilumba ndi m'nyanja simukufunikira kwenikweni bwato.

en: Although the coastal archipelagos and the biggest lakes are indeed big enough for any yacht, smaller boats or even a kayak offer a different experience.
ny: Ngakhale kuti zilumba za m'mphepete mwa nyanja ndi nyanja zazikulu kwambiri n'zazikulu moti n'zotheka kukwera pa bwato lililonse, mabwato ang'onoang'ono kapena ngakhale bwato la kayak, zimatipatsa mwayi wosangalala ndi moyo.

en: Boating is a national pastime in Finland, with a boat to every seven or eight people.
ny: Kupalasa bwato ndi njira yachisangalalo ya dziko lonse la Finland, ndipo anthu asanu ndi aŵiri kapena asanu ndi atatu alionse amakhala ndi bwato.

en: This is matched by Norway, Sweden and New Zealand, but otherwise quite unique (e.g. in the Netherlands the figure is one to forty).
ny: Izi zikugwirizana ndi Norway, Sweden ndi New Zealand, koma mwa njira ina ndi zapadera (mwachitsanzo ku Netherlands chiwerengerocho ndi chimodzi mpaka makumi anayi).

en: Most of the distinct Baltic Cruises feature an extended stay in St. Petersburg, Russia.
ny: Maulendo ambiri a Baltic Cruises amakhala ku St. Petersburg, Russia.

en: This means you can visit the historic city for a couple of full days while returning and sleeping on the ship at night.
ny: Zimenezi zikutanthauza kuti mukhoza kukaona mzinda wakalewu kwa masiku angapo, n'kubwereranso ndi kugona pa sitima usiku.

en: If you only go ashore using shipboard excursions you will not need a separate visa (as of 2009).
ny: Ngati mukungoyenda pa sitima, simukufunika kukhala ndi visa ina (kuyambira mu 2009).

en: Some cruises feature Berlin, Germany in the brochures. As you can see from the map above Berlin is no where near the sea and a visit to the city is not included in the price of the cruise.
ny: Monga momwe mungaonere pa mapu pamwambapa, mzinda wa Berlin ulibe nyanja ndipo ulendo wopita ku mzindawu sukuphatikizidwa mu mtengo wa ulendowu.

en: Travelling by plane can be a scary experience for people of all ages and backgrounds, particularly if they've not flown before or have experienced a traumatic event.
ny: Anthu a misinkhu yonse ndiponso a zikhalidwe zosiyanasiyana amaopa kwambiri akamayenda pandege, makamaka ngati sanapitepo pa ndege kapena ngati anakumanapo ndi zinthu zoopsa.

en: It is not something to be ashamed of: it is no different from the personal fears and dislikes of other things that very many people have.
ny: Sichinthu chochititsa manyazi: sichisiyana ndi mantha aumwini ndi kusakonda zinthu zina zimene anthu ambiri amakhala nazo.

en: For some, understanding something about how aircraft work and what happens during a flight may help to overcome a fear which is based on the unknown or on not being in control.
ny: Anthu ena akamvetsa mmene ndege zimagwirira ntchito komanso zimene zimachitika pa nthawi imene akuuluka, amaopa kwambiri zinthu zosadziwika kapena zimene sangakwanitse kuchita.

en: Courier companies are well paid for delivering things quickly. Frequently, time is very important with business documents, merchandise or spare parts for an urgent repair.
ny: Makampani opereka mauthenga amalipidwa bwino chifukwa chopereka zinthu mofulumira. Nthaŵi zambiri, nthaŵi imakhala yofunika kwambiri pankhani ya zikalata za bizinesi, katundu kapena mbali zosinthira za kukonza kofulumira.

en: On some routes, the larger companies have their own planes, but for other routes and smaller firms there was a problem.
ny: Pa maulendo ena, makampani akuluakulu ali ndi ndege zawo, koma kwa maulendo ena ndi makampani ang'onoang'ono panali vuto.

en: If they sent things by air freight, on some routes it may have taken days to get through unloading and customs.
ny: Ngati anatumiza katundu ndi ndege, pa maulendo ena zingatenge masiku ambiri kuti akamasule katundu ndi kudutsa m'ndende.

en: The only way to get it through faster was to send it as checked luggage. Airline regulations will not allow them to send luggage without a passenger, which is where you come in.
ny: Njira yokha yotumizira katunduyo mofulumira inali kum'tumizira ngati katundu wolembetsedwa.

en: The obvious way of flying in first or business class is to fork out a thick wad of money for the privilege (or, better yet, get your company to do it for you).
ny: Njira yodziŵika bwino youluka mu kalasi yoyamba kapena ya bizinesi ndiyo kupereka ndalama zambiri kaamba ka mwaŵiwo (kapena, chabwino kwambiri, kupempha kampani yanu kukuchitirani zimenezo).

en: However, this does not come cheap: as rough rules of thumb, you can expect to pay up to four times the normal economy fare for business, and eleven times for first class!
ny: Komabe, zimenezi sizimabwera pa mtengo wotsika: monga lamulo la mphuno, mungayembekezere kulipira maulendo anayi kuposa mtengo waulendo wamba wa bizinesi, ndi maulendo khumi ndi limodzi pa kalasi yoyamba!

en: Generally speaking, there is no point in even looking for discounts for business or first-class seats on direct flights from A to B.
ny: Kunena mwachidule, palibe chifukwa chofunsira kuchotsera ndalama pa maulendo a ndege a A kupita ku B kapena pa maulendo a ndege a kalasi yoyamba.

en: Airlines know well that there is a certain core group of flyers who are willing to pay top dollar for the privilege of getting somewhere fast and in comfort, and charge accordingly.
ny: Ndege zimadziŵa bwino kuti pali gulu lina la anthu oyenda ndege amene ali ofunitsitsa kulipira ndalama zambiri kuti apeze mwayi wopita kwinakwake mofulumira ndi momasuka, ndipo amalipira ndalama zoyenerera.

en: The capital of Moldova is Chişinău. The local language is Romanian, but Russian is widely used.
ny: Mzindawu uli ndi likulu lake la Chişinău, ndipo chilankhulo chawo ndi Chiromaniya.

en: Moldova is a multi-ethnic republic that has suffered from ethnic conflict.
ny: Dziko la Moldova ndi dziko la anthu amitundu yosiyanasiyana ndipo lakhala likuvutika chifukwa cha mikangano ya pakati pa mitundu.

en: In 1994, this conflict led to the creation of the self-proclaimed Transnistria Republic in eastern Moldova, which has its own government and currency but is not recognised by any UN member country.
ny: Mu 1994, nkhondo imeneyi inachititsa kuti pakhale dziko lodziimira lokha la Transnistria Republic kum'mawa kwa Moldova, lomwe lili ndi boma lake ndi ndalama zake koma silivomerezedwa ndi dziko lililonse la m'gulu la UN.

en: Economic links have been re-established between these two parts of Moldova despite the failure in political negotiations.
ny: Maulumikizi a zachuma abwezeretsedwa pakati pa mbali ziŵiri zimenezi za Moldova ngakhale kuti kukambitsirana kwa ndale kunalephera.

en: The major religion in Moldova is Orthodox Christian.
ny: Chipembedzo chachikulu ku Moldova ndi chachikristu cha Orthodox.

en: İzmir is the third largest city in Turkey with a population of around 3.7 million, the second biggest port after Istanbul, and a very good transport hub.
ny: Izmir ndi mzinda wachitatu waukulu kwambiri ku Turkey ndi anthu pafupifupi 3.7 miliyoni, doko lachiwiri lalikulu kwambiri pambuyo pa Istanbul, ndi malo abwino kwambiri oyendera anthu.

en: Once the ancient city of Smyrna, it is now a modern, developed, and busy commercial center, set around a huge bay and surrounded by mountains.
ny: Mzinda wakale wa Smurna, umene kale unali mzinda, tsopano ndi mzinda wamakono, wotukuka, ndi wotanganidwa wa zamalonda, wokhala mozungulira doko lalikulu ndi kuzunguliridwa ndi mapiri.

en: The broad boulevards, glass-fronted buildings and modern shopping centers are dotted with traditional red-tiled roofs, the 18th century market, and old mosques and churches, although the city has an atmosphere more of Mediterranean Europe than traditional Turkey.
ny: Misewu ikuluikulu, nyumba zokhala ndi magalasi ndi malo ogulitsira amakono ali ndi madenga ofiira, msika wa m'zaka za zana la 18, ndi misikiti yakale ndi matchalitchi, ngakhale kuti mzindawu uli ndi mlengalenga wa Mediterranean Europe kuposa Turkey.

en: The village of Haldarsvík offer views of the nearby island Eysturoy and has an unusual octagonal church.
ny: M'mudzi wa Haldarsvík muli malo okongola kwambiri omwe amasonyeza chilumba cha Eysturoy ndipo muli tchalitchi cha makona asanu ndi atatu.

en: In the churchyard, there are interesting marble sculptures of doves over some tombs.
ny: M'bwalo la manda, muli ziboliboli za marble zokondweretsa za nkhunda pamwamba pa manda ena.

en: It's worth half an hour to stroll about the intriguing village.
ny: Ndi bwino kuti muziyenda m'mudzi wochititsa chidwiwu kwa theka la ola.

en: To the north and within easy reach is the romantic and fascinating town of Sintra and which was made famous to foreigners after a glowing account of its splendours recorded by Lord Byron.
ny: Kumpoto ndi kufupi ndi tauni ya Sintra imene ndi yokongola ndiponso yosangalatsa kwambiri ndipo inadzamveka kwa alendo chifukwa cha nkhani yosangalatsa ya ulemerero wake imene Lord Byron analemba.

en: Scotturb Bus 403 travels regularly to Sintra, stopping at Cabo da Roca.
ny: Mabasi a Scotturb 403 amapita ku Sintra ndipo amaima ku Cabo da Roca.

en: Also to the north visit the great Sanctuary of Our Lady of Fatima (Shrine), a place of worldwide famous Marian apparitions.
ny: Komanso kumpoto kukaona Malo Opatulika a Namwali Wathu wa ku Fatima (Shrine), malo otchuka padziko lonse a maonekedwe a Mariya.

en: Please remember that you are essentially visiting a mass grave site, as well as a site that has an almost incalculable meaning to a significant portion of the world's population.
ny: Chonde kumbukirani kuti kwenikweni mukuchezera malo a manda ochuluka, komanso malo amene ali ndi tanthauzo losadziŵika kwa mbali yaikulu ya anthu padziko lapansi.

en: There are still many men and women alive who survived their time here, and many more who had loved ones who were murdered or worked to death there, Jews and non-Jews alike.
ny: Pali amuna ndi akazi ambiri amene anapulumuka pa nthawi imene anali kuno, ndipo pali enanso ambiri amene anali ndi okondedwa awo amene anaphedwa kapena kugwira ntchito mpaka kufa, Ayuda ndi osakhala Ayuda omwe.

en: Please treat the site with all of the dignity, solemnity and respect it deserves. Do not make jokes about the Holocaust or Nazis.
ny: Chonde chitirani malowo ulemu, ulemu ndi ulemu wonse umene umawayenerera.

en: Do not deface the site by marking or scratching graffiti into structures.
ny: Musamawononge malowo mwa kulembapo kapena kujambulapo zithunzi.

en: Barcelona's official languages are Catalan and Spanish. About a half prefer to speak Catalan, a vast majority understands it, and virtually everyone knows Spanish.
ny: Anthu pafupifupi theka la anthu a ku Barcelona amalankhula Chikatalani, ndipo ambiri amamvetsa Chikatalani ndipo pafupifupi aliyense amadziwa Chisipanishi.

en: However, most signs are indicated only in Catalan because it is established by law as the first official language.
ny: Komabe, zizindikiro zambiri zimalembedwa m'Ccatalan chifukwa chakuti ndi chinenero choyamba cha boma.

en: Yet, Spanish is also widely used in public transport and other facilities.
ny: Komabe, Chisipanishi chimagwiritsidwanso ntchito kwambiri m'mayendedwe a anthu onse ndi m'zinthu zina.

en: Regular announcements in the Metro are made only in Catalan, but unplanned disruptions are announced by an automated system in a wide variety of languages including Spanish, English, French, Arabic and Japanese.
ny: Zolengeza za nthaŵi zonse za m'sitima za pansi panthaka zimachitika m'Ccatalan kokha, koma zosokoneza zosakonzedweratu zimalengezedwa ndi makina a m'zinenero zosiyanasiyana kuphatikizapo Chisipanishi, Chingelezi, Chifalansa, Chiarabu ndi Chijapanizi.

en: Parisians have a reputation for being egocentric, rude and arrogant.
ny: Anthu a ku Paris amadziwika kuti ndi odzikonda, onyansa ndiponso odzikuza.

en: While this is often only an inaccurate stereotype, the best way to get along in Paris still is to be on your best behavior, acting like someone who is "bien élevé" (well brought up). It will make getting about considerably easier.
ny: Ngakhale kuti nthaŵi zambiri zimenezi zimakhala chabe malingaliro olakwika, njira yabwino kwambiri yochitira zinthu bwino ku Paris ndiyo kukhala ndi khalidwe labwino, kuchita zinthu ngati munthu "bien élevé" (wokula bwino).

en: Parisians' abrupt exteriors will rapidly evaporate if you display some basic courtesies.
ny: Maonekedwe a anthu a ku Paris amene amaoneka ngati achilendo adzazimiririka mwamsanga ngati mutasonyeza ulemu.

en: The Plitvice Lakes national park is heavily forested, mainly with beech, spruce, and fir trees, and features a mixture of Alpine and Mediterranean vegetation.
ny: M'nkhalango ya Plitvice Lakes muli mitengo yambiri, makamaka ya mitengo ya mitengo ya beech, ya spruce, ndi ya mitengo ya nsungwi, ndipo muli zomera za m'mapiri a Alps ndi Mediterranean.

en: It has a notably wide variety of plant communities, due to its range of microclimates, differing soils and varying levels of altitude.
ny: M'derali muli zomera zambiri chifukwa cha mikhalidwe yake yosiyanasiyana ya nyengo, dothi lake losiyanasiyana ndiponso kutalika kwake.

en: The area is also home to an extremely wide variety of animal and bird species.
ny: M'derali mulinso mitundu yosiyanasiyana ya nyama ndi mbalame.

en: Rare fauna such as the European brown bear, wolf, eagle, owl, lynx, wild cat and capercaillie can be found there, along with many more common species
ny: Zinyama zosaoneka bwino monga chimbalangondo chofiirira cha ku Ulaya, mmbulu, chiwombankhanga, nkhunda, nkhandwe, mphaka wa kuthengo ndi nyama zina zopezeka m'madera ena zimapezeka kumeneko, komanso mitundu ina yambiri ya nyama

en: While visiting the monasteries, women are required to wear skirts covering the knees and have their shoulders covered, too.
ny: Akazi akapita ku nyumba za amonke, amafunika kuvala masiketi okwirira mawondo ndi kuphimba mapewa awo.

en: Most of the monasteries do provide wraps for women who come unprepared, but if you bring your own, especially one with bright colors, you'll get a smile from the monk or nun at the entrance.
ny: M'nyumba za amonke zambiri mumakhala zovala za akazi amene amabwera osakonzekera, koma ngati mubwera ndi zanu, makamaka za mitundu yowala, mudzamwetulira kwa m'busa kapena m'modzi wa m'zipembedzo pakhomo.

en: Along the same line, men are required to wear trousers covering the knees.
ny: Mofananamo, amuna amafunika kuvala mathalauza okwirira mawondo.

en: This too can be borrowed from the stock at the entrance but that clothing isn't washed after every user so you may not feel comfortable wearing these skirts. One size fits all for men!
ny: N'zotheka kubwereka zovala zimenezi pa malo amene mumalowa, koma zovalazo sizichotsedwa pambuyo pa nthawi iliyonse imene mwazigwiritsa ntchito, choncho mwina simungasangalale kuvala masiketi amenewa.

en: Majorcan cuisine, like that of similar zones in the Mediterranean, is based on bread, vegetables and meat (specially pork), and uses olive oil throughout.
ny: Chakudya cha ku Mallorca, mofanana ndi cha madera ofanana ndi a ku Mediterranean, chimakhala ndi mkate, ndiwo zamasamba ndi nyama (makamaka nkhumba), ndipo chimagwiritsa ntchito mafuta a azitona.

en: A simple popular dinner, especially during the summer, is the Pa amb Oli: Bread with olive oil, tomato, and any available condiments such as cheese, tunafish, etc.
ny: Chakudya chosavuta chotchuka, makamaka m'chilimwe, ndi Pa amb Oli: Mkate wokhala ndi mafuta a azitona, tomato, ndi zonunkhira zilizonse monga tchizi, nsomba za tuna, ndi zina zotero.

en: All nouns, alongside the word Sie for you, always begin with a capital letter, even in the middle of a sentence.
ny: Mawu onse, pamodzi ndi mawu akuti Sie, omwe amatanthauza inu, nthaŵi zonse amayamba ndi chilembo chachikulu, ngakhale pakati pa chiganizo.

en: This is an important way to distinguish between some verbs and objects.
ny: Imeneyi ndi njira yofunika kwambiri yodziŵira kusiyana kwa mawu ena ndi zinthu zina.

en: It also arguably makes reading easier, though writing is somewhat complicated by the need to find out whether a verb or adjective is used in a substantivized form.
ny: N'kuthekanso kuti zimenezi zimachititsa kuti kuwerenga kukhale kosavuta, ngakhale kuti kulemba kumakhala kovuta chifukwa chofuna kudziwa ngati mawu kapena mawu otchulidwa akugwiritsidwa ntchito m'njira yowonjezera.

en: Pronunciation is relatively easy in Italian since most words are pronounced exactly how they are written
ny: Kulankhula kwa Chitaliyana n'kosavuta chifukwa mawu ambiri amalankhulidwa ndendende mmene amalembedwera

en: The main letters to watch out for are c and g, since their pronunciation varies based on the following vowel.
ny: Zilembo zazikulu zimene muyenera kusamala nazo ndi c ndi g, chifukwa chakuti katchulidwe kake kamasiyana malinga ndi vowel yotsatira.

en: Also, make sure to pronounce r and rr differently: caro means dear, whereas carro means chariot.
ny: Komanso, onetsetsani kuti mukuyankhula r ndi rr mosiyana: caro amatanthauza wokondedwa, pamene carro amatanthauza galeta.

en: Persian has a relatively easy and mostly regular grammar.
ny: Chiperisiya chili ndi galamala yosavuta ndiponso yokhazikika.

en: Therefore, reading this grammar primer would help you learn much about Persian grammar and understand phrases better.
ny: Choncho, kuŵerenga buku la galamala limeneli kungakuthandizeni kuphunzira zambiri zokhudza galamala ya Chiperisiya ndi kumvetsa bwino ziganizo.

en: Needless to say, if you know a Romance language, it will be easier for you to learn Portuguese.
ny: N'zosachita kufunsa kuti ngati mukudziwa chinenero cha Chiromance, mudzaphunzira Chipwitikizi mosavuta.

en: However, people who know a little Spanish may hastily conclude that Portuguese is close enough that it need not be studied separately.
ny: Komabe, anthu amene amadziwa Chisipanishi pang'ono angaganize kuti Chipwitikizi n'chofanana kwambiri moti sichifunika kuphunzira payekha.

en: Pre-modern observatories are usually obsolete today, and remain as museums, or sites of education.
ny: Malo oonerera zinthu akale kaŵirikaŵiri amakhala achikale lerolino, ndipo amakhalabe ngati nyumba zosungiramo zinthu zakale, kapena malo ophunzirira.

en: As light pollution in their heyday was not the kind of problem it is today, they are usually located in cities or at campuses, easier to reach than those built in modern times.
ny: Popeza kuti m'nthaŵi yawo ya chitukuko, kuipitsidwa kwa kuwala sikunali vuto ngati mmene kulili lerolino, kaŵirikaŵiri malo ameneŵa amakhala m'mizinda kapena m'makampasi, ndipo ndi osavuta kufika poyerekezera ndi nyumba zimene zimamangidwa m'nthaŵi zamakono.

en: Most modern research telescopes are enormous facilities in remote areas with favorable atmospheric conditions.
ny: Ma telesikopu ambiri amakono ofufuzira ali ndi malo aakulu kwambiri m'madera akutali ndi okhala ndi mlengalenga wabwino.

en: Cherry blossom viewing, known as hanami, has been a part of Japanese culture since the 8th century.
ny: Kuonera maluwa a chitumbuwa, kotchedwa hanami, kwakhala mbali ya chikhalidwe cha ku Japan kuyambira m'zaka za zana la 8.

en: The concept came from China where plum blossoms were the flower of choice.
ny: Lingaliro limeneli linachokera ku China kumene maluŵa a plum anali maluŵa osankhidwa kwambiri.

en: In Japan, the first cherry blossom parties were hosted by the emperor only for himself and other members of the aristocracy around the Imperial Court.
ny: Ku Japan, phwando loyamba la maluwa a chitumbuwa linakonzedwa ndi mfumu yokha ndi anthu ena a m'banja lachifumu pafupi ndi Nyumba ya Mfumu.

en: Plants look their best when in a natural environment, so resist the temptation to remove even "just one" specimen.
ny: Zomera zimaoneka bwino kwambiri pamene zili m'malo achilengedwe, chotero peŵani chiyeso chochotsa ngakhale "mbewu imodzi" yokha.

en: If visiting a formally arranged garden, collecting "specimens" is also going to get you ejected, without discussion.
ny: Ngati mupita ku munda wokonzedwa mwalamulo, kusonkhanitsa "ziwonetsero" kudzakuchititsani kuti muchotsedwe, popanda kukambitsirana.

en: Singapore is generally an extremely safe place to be and very easy to navigate, and you can buy almost anything after arriving.
ny: Singapore ndi malo otetezeka kwambiri ndipo n'kosavuta kuyenda, ndipo munthu akhoza kugula pafupifupi chilichonse akafika kumeneko.

en: But being placed in the "high tropics" just a few degrees north of equator you will need to deal with both heat (always) and strong sun (when the sky is clear, more rarely).
ny: Koma pokhala mu "malo otentha" madigiri angapo kumpoto kwa equator mudzafunikira kuthana ndi kutentha (nthaŵi zonse) ndi dzuŵa lamphamvu (pamene thambo lili loyera, kaŵirikaŵiri).

en: There are also a few buses going north to Hebron, the traditional burial place of the Biblical patriarchs Abraham, Isaac, Jacob, and their wives.
ny: Palinso mabasi angapo opita kumpoto ku Hebroni, malo a mwambo a manda a makolo a m'Baibulo Abrahamu, Isake, Yakobo, ndi akazi awo.

en: Check that the bus you are thinking of taking goes into Hebron and not just to the nearby Jewish settlement of Kiryat Arba.
ny: Onetsetsani kuti basi imene mukuganiza kuti mukatenge ikupita ku Hebroni osati kumudzi wapafupi wa Ayuda wa Kiryat Arba.

en: Inland waterways can be a good theme to base a holiday around.
ny: Njira zam'madzi za m'kati mwa dziko zingakhale nkhani yabwino kwambiri yochitira maholide.

en: For example visiting castles in the Loire Valley, the Rhine valley or taking a cruise to interesting cites on the Danube or boating along the Erie Canal.
ny: Mwachitsanzo, mungapite kukaona nyumba zachifumu za m'chigwa cha Loire, m'chigwa cha Rhine, kapena mungapite kukaona mizinda yosangalatsa ya m'mphepete mwa mtsinje wa Danube kapena mungapite kukaona malo ena okongola a m'mphepete mwa mtsinje wa Erie.

en: They also define routes for popular hiking and cycling trails.
ny: Amadziŵanso njira zimene anthu ambiri amayendera popita kukayenda ndi kukwera njinga.

en: Christmas is one of the most important holidays of Christianity, and is celebrated as the birthday of Jesus.
ny: Khirisimasi ndi imodzi mwa maholide ofunika kwambiri m'Chikristu, ndipo imakondwerera kubadwa kwa Yesu.

en: Many of the traditions surrounding the holiday have been adopted also by non-believers in Christian countries and non-Christians around the world.
ny: Miyambo yambiri yokhudza holideyi yalandiridwanso ndi anthu osakhulupirira m'mayiko achikristu ndi anthu osakhulupirira padziko lonse.

en: There's a tradition to pass the Easter night awake at some exposed point to see the sunrise.
ny: Pali mwambo woti usiku wa Isitala anthu amakhala maso pamalo enaake kuti aone kutuluka kwa dzuŵa.

en: There are of course Christian theological explanations for this tradition, but it may well be a pre-Christian Spring and Fertility ritual.
ny: N'zoona kuti pali zifukwa zina zachikristu zofotokozera mwambo umenewu, koma mwina ndi mwambo wa Chilimwe ndi Kubereka umene unalipo Chikristu chisanayambe.

en: More traditional churches often hold an Easter Vigil on Saturday night during the Easter weekend, with the congregations often breaking into celebration at the stroke of midnight to celebrate Christ's resurrection.
ny: Matchalitchi achikhalidwe kwambiri kaŵirikaŵiri amakhala ndi Mgonero wa Isitala pa Loweruka usiku mkati mwa mapeto a sabata la Isitala, ndi mipingo kaŵirikaŵiri kuloŵa m'chikondwerero pakumenyedwa kwa pakati pa usiku kukondwerera kuuka kwa Kristu.

en: All animals that originally arrived in the islands came here either by swimming, flying or floating.
ny: Nyama zonse zimene poyamba zinafika pazilumbazi zinabwera kuno mwa kusambira, kuwuluka kapena kuyenda pamadzi.

en: Due to the long distance from the continent mammals were unable to make the journey making the giant tortoise the primary grazing animal in the Galapagos.
ny: Chifukwa cha kutalika kwa mtunda wa dziko lapansi, nyama zoyamwitsa sizinathe kuyenda ulendo umenewu, ndipo zimenezi zinachititsa kuti nyama yaikulu kwambiri ya pamtunda ya Galapagos ikhale nyama yoyamba kudya nyama.

en: Since the arrival of man to the Galapagos, many mammals have been introduced including goats, horses, cows, rats, cats and dogs.
ny: Kuyambira pamene munthu anafika ku Galapagos, nyama zambiri zoyamwitsa zinayambitsidwa kuphatikizapo mbuzi, akavalo, ng'ombe, makoswe, amphaka ndi agalu.

en: If you visit the Arctic or Antarctic areas in the winter you will experience the polar night, which means that the sun doesn't rise above the horizon.
ny: Ngati mupita ku Arctic kapena ku Antarctic m'nyengo yachisanu, mudzakhala ndi usiku wa ku polar, kutanthauza kuti dzuŵa silimawala.

en: This offers a good opportunity to see the Aurora borealis, as the sky will be dark more or less around the clock.
ny: Zimenezi zimapereka mpata wabwino woona Aurora borealis, popeza kuti kumwamba kudzakhala mdima nthaŵi zonse.

en: As the areas are sparsely populated, and light pollution therefore often not a problem, you will also be able to enjoy the stars.
ny: Popeza kuti anthu m'madera ameneŵa amakhala ochepa, ndipo chifukwa cha zimenezi, kuunika sikumakhala vuto, mudzatha kusangalala ndi nyenyezi.

en: Japanese work culture is more hierarchical and formal that what Westerners may be used to.
ny: Chikhalidwe cha ntchito cha ku Japan n'chokhazikika ndi chovomerezeka kwambiri kuposa chimene anthu a kumadzulo amagwiritsa ntchito.

en: Suits are standard business attire, and coworkers call each other by their family names or by job titles.
ny: Ma suti ndi zovala zofala pantchito, ndipo ogwira nawo ntchito amatchulana mayina awo kapena mayina a ntchito.

en: Workplace harmony is crucial, emphasizing group effort rather than praising individual accomplishments.
ny: Kugwirizana kwa anthu kuntchito n'kofunika kwambiri, chifukwa anthu amaganizira kwambiri zimene gulu likuchita m'malo momatamanda zimene munthu aliyense wachita.

en: Workers must often get their superiors' approval for any decisions they make, and are expected to obey their superiors' instructions without question.
ny: Nthaŵi zambiri antchito amafunika kuvomerezedwa ndi akuluakulu awo pa zosankha zilizonse zimene amapanga, ndipo amayembekezeredwa kumvera malangizo a akuluakulu awo popanda kukayikira.
